2439544Di2015UniqueSeparatorSystem.Web.MailMessage
2439544Di2015UniqueSeparatorMailMessage message = new MailMessage();Di2015NewLine// Very basic html. HTML should always be valid, otherwise you go to spamDi2015NewLinemessage.Body = "<html><body><p>test</p></body></html>"; Di2015NewLine// QuotedPrintable encoding is the default, but will often lead to trouble, Di2015NewLine// so you should set something meaningful here. Could also be ASCII or some ISODi2015NewLinemessage.BodyEncoding = Encoding.UTF8;Di2015NewLinemessage.IsBodyHtml = true;Di2015NewLine// No Subject usually goes to spam, tooDi2015NewLinemessage.Subject = "Some Subject";Di2015NewLine// Note that you can add multiple recipients, bcc, cc rec., etc. Using the Di2015NewLine// address-only syntax, i.e. w/o a readable name saves you from some issuesDi2015NewLinemessage.To.Add("someone@gmail.com");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// SmtpHost, -Port, -User, -Password must be a valid account you can use to Di2015NewLine// send messages. Note that it is very often required that the account youDi2015NewLine// use also has the specified sender address associated! Di2015NewLine// If you configure the Smtp yourself, you can change that of courseDi2015NewLineSmtpClient client = new SmtpClient(SmtpHost, SmtpPort) {Di2015NewLine            Credentials = new NetworkCredential(SmtpUser, SmtpPassword),Di2015NewLine            EnableSsl = enableSsl;Di2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        try {Di2015NewLine            // It might be necessary to enforce a specific sender address, see aboveDi2015NewLine            if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(ForceSenderAddress)) {Di2015NewLine                message.From = new MailAddress(ForceSenderAddress);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            client.Send(message);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (Exception ex) {Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine

2448530Di2015UniqueSeparator// The delegate type. This one is from the library, in the System namespaceDi2015NewLinepublic delegate void Eventhandler(object sender, Eventargs args);  Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// your classDi2015NewLineclass Foo  Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public event EventHandler Changed;    // the EventDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected virtual void OnChanged()    // the Trigger. Foo calls this to raise the eventDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // make a copy to be more thread-safeDi2015NewLine        EventHandler handler = Changed;   Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (handler != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // invoke the subscribed event-handler(s)Di2015NewLine            handler(this, EventArgs.Empty);  Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
2448530Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass BarDi2015NewLine{      Di2015NewLine    Foo f;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Bar()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        f = new Foo();Di2015NewLine        f.Changed += Foo_Changed;    // SubscribeDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    void Foo_Changed(object sender, EventArgs args)  // the Handler (reacts)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // the things Bar has to do when Foo changesDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
2448530Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass MyEventArgs : EventArgsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public string Info { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass Foo  Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public event EventHandler<MyEventArgs> Changed;    // the EventDi2015NewLine    ...Di2015NewLine    protected virtual void OnChanged(string info)      // the TriggerDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        EventHandler handler = Changed;   // make a copy to be more thread-safeDi2015NewLine        if (handler != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine           var args = new MyEventArgs(){Info = info};  // this part will varyDi2015NewLine           handler(this, args);  Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass BarDi2015NewLine{       Di2015NewLine   void Foo_Changed(object sender, MyEventArgs args)  // the HandlerDi2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine       string s = args.Info;Di2015NewLine       ...Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
2448546Di2015UniqueSeparator    static byte[] Year2Bcd(int year) {Di2015NewLine        if (year < 0 || year > 9999) throw new ArgumentException();Di2015NewLine        int bcd = 0;Di2015NewLine        for (int digit = 0; digit < 4; ++digit) {Di2015NewLine            int nibble = year % 10;Di2015NewLine            bcd |= nibble << (digit * 4);Di2015NewLine            year /= 10;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return new byte[] { (byte)((bcd >> 8) & 0xff), (byte)(bcd & 0xff) };Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

2448918Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class TypeExtensionsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static string ToGenericTypeString(this Type t)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (!t.IsGenericType)Di2015NewLine            return t.Name;Di2015NewLine        string genericTypeName = t.GetGenericTypeDefinition().Name;Di2015NewLine        genericTypeName = genericTypeName.Substring(0,Di2015NewLine            genericTypeName.IndexOf('`'));Di2015NewLine        string genericArgs = string.Join(",",Di2015NewLine            t.GetGenericArguments()Di2015NewLine                .Select(ta => ToGenericTypeString(ta)).ToArray());Di2015NewLine        return genericTypeName + "<" + genericArgs + ">";Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2453016Di2015UniqueSeparatorcreate function FiscalWeek (@startMonth varchar(2), @myDate datetime)  Di2015NewLinereturns int  Di2015NewLineas  Di2015NewLinebegin  Di2015NewLinedeclare @firstWeek datetime  Di2015NewLinedeclare @weekNum int  Di2015NewLinedeclare @year int  Di2015NewLineset @year = datepart(year, @myDate)+1  Di2015NewLine--Get 4th day of month of next year, this will always be in week 1  Di2015NewLineset @firstWeek = convert(datetime, str(@year)+@startMonth+'04', 102)  Di2015NewLine--Retreat to beginning of week  Di2015NewLineset @firstWeek = dateadd(day, (1-datepart(dw, @firstWeek)), @firstWeek)  Di2015NewLinewhile @myDate < @firstWeek --Repeat the above steps but for previous year  Di2015NewLine begin  Di2015NewLine  set @year = @year - 1  Di2015NewLine  set @firstWeek = convert(datetime, str(@year)+@startMonth+'04', 102)  Di2015NewLine  set @firstWeek = dateadd(day, (1-datepart(dw, @firstWeek)), @firstWeek)  Di2015NewLine end  Di2015NewLineset @weekNum = (@year*100)+((datediff(day, @firstweek, @myDate)/7)+1)  Di2015NewLinereturn @weekNum  Di2015NewLineend  Di2015NewLine

2467278Di2015UniqueSeparator    private class AsyncStateDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public NetworkStream ns;Di2015NewLine        public ManualResetEvent e;Di2015NewLine        public byte[] b;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Run()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        NetworkStream networkStream = ...;Di2015NewLine        byte[] buffer = new byte[1024];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var completedEvent = new ManualResetEvent(false);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        networkStream.BeginRead(buffer, 0, buffer.Length,Di2015NewLine                                AsyncRead,Di2015NewLine                                new AsyncStateDi2015NewLine                                {Di2015NewLine                                    b = buffer,Di2015NewLine                                    ns = networkStream,Di2015NewLine                                    e = completedEventDi2015NewLine                                });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // do other stuff here. ...Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // finally, wait for the reading to completeDi2015NewLine        completedEvent.WaitOne();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void AsyncRead(IAsyncResult ar)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        AsyncState state = ar as AsyncState;Di2015NewLine        int n = state.ns.EndRead(ar);Di2015NewLine        if (n == 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // signal completionDi2015NewLine            state.e.Set();Di2015NewLine            return;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // state.buffer now contains the bytes readDi2015NewLine        // do something with it here...Di2015NewLine        // for example, dump it into a filesystem file. Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // read againDi2015NewLine        state.ns.BeginRead(state.b, 0, state.b.Length, AsyncRead, state);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

2471631Di2015UniqueSeparator///<summary>Finds the index of the first item matching an expression in an enumerable.</summary>Di2015NewLine///<param name="items">The enumerable to search.</param>Di2015NewLine///<param name="predicate">The expression to test the items against.</param>Di2015NewLine///<returns>The index of the first matching item, or -1 if no items match.</returns>Di2015NewLinepublic static int FindIndex<T>(this IEnumerable<T> items, Func<T, bool> predicate) {Di2015NewLine    if (items == null) throw new ArgumentNullException("items");Di2015NewLine    if (predicate == null) throw new ArgumentNullException("predicate");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int retVal = 0;Di2015NewLine    foreach (var item in items) {Di2015NewLine        if (predicate(item)) return retVal;Di2015NewLine        retVal++;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return -1;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine///<summary>Finds the index of the first occurence of an item in an enumerable.</summary>Di2015NewLine///<param name="items">The enumerable to search.</param>Di2015NewLine///<param name="item">The item to find.</param>Di2015NewLine///<returns>The index of the first matching item, or -1 if the item was not found.</returns>Di2015NewLinepublic static int IndexOf<T>(this IEnumerable<T> items, T item) { return items.FindIndex(i => EqualityComparer<T>.Default.Equals(item, i)); }Di2015NewLine

2471773Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate string MakeWebServiceCall(string methodName, string requestXmlString)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            WebRequest webRequest = WebRequest.Create("https://subreg.forpsi.com/robot2/subreg_command.php");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            HttpWebRequest httpRequest = (HttpWebRequest)webRequest;Di2015NewLine            httpRequest.Method = "POST";Di2015NewLine            httpRequest.ContentType = "text/xml";Di2015NewLine            httpRequest.Headers.Add("SOAPAction: https://subreg.forpsi.com/robot2/subreg_command.php/" + methodName);Di2015NewLine            Stream requestStream = httpRequest.GetRequestStream();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //Create Stream and Complete RequestDi2015NewLine            StreamWriter streamWriter = new StreamWriter(requestStream);Di2015NewLine            streamWriter.Write(String.Format(this.GetSoapString(), requestXmlString));Di2015NewLine            streamWriter.Close();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //Get the ResponseDi2015NewLine            WebResponse webResponse = httpRequest.GetResponse();Di2015NewLine            Stream responseStream = webResponse.GetResponseStream();Di2015NewLine            StreamReader streamReader = new StreamReader(responseStream);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //Read the response into an xml documentDi2015NewLine            System.Xml.XmlDocument soapResonseXMLDocument = new System.Xml.XmlDocument();Di2015NewLine            soapResonseXMLDocument.LoadXml(streamReader.ReadToEnd());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //return only the xml representing the response details (inner request)Di2015NewLine            return soapResonseXMLDocument.GetElementsByTagName(methodName + "Result")[0].InnerXml;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine
2471773Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate string GetSoapString()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            StringBuilder soapRequest = new StringBuilder("<soap:Envelope xmlns:xsi=\\"http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance\\"");Di2015NewLine            soapRequest.Append(" xmlns:xsd=\\"http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema\\" ");Di2015NewLine            soapRequest.Append("xmlns:soap=\\"http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/\\"><soap:Body>");Di2015NewLine            soapRequest.Append("{0}");Di2015NewLine            soapRequest.Append("</soap:Body></soap:Envelope>");Di2015NewLine            return soapRequest.ToString();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine

2484365Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Text;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static void Main()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string original = "phenomenal";Di2015NewLine        string pattern = "*xo**q*t**";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        string[] replacements = StringUtility.GetReplacementStrings(original, pattern, true);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (string replacement in replacements)Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine(replacement);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.Read();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static class StringUtilityDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public static string[] GetReplacementStrings(string original, string pattern, bool includeOriginal)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // pattern and original might not be same lengthDi2015NewLine            int maxIndex = Math.Max(original.Length, pattern.Length);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            List<int> positions = GetPatternPositions(pattern, maxIndex, '*');Di2015NewLine            List<int[]> subsets = ArrayUtility.CreateSubsets(positions.ToArray());Di2015NewLine            List<string> replacements = GenerateReplacements(original, pattern, subsets);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (includeOriginal)Di2015NewLine                replacements.Insert(0, original);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return replacements.ToArray();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static List<string> GenerateReplacements(string original, string pattern, List<int[]> subsets)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            List<string> replacements = new List<string>();Di2015NewLine            char[] temp = new char[original.Length];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            foreach (int[] subset in subsets)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                original.CopyTo(0, temp, 0, original.Length);Di2015NewLine                foreach (int index in subset)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    temp[index] = pattern[index];Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                replacements.Add(new string(temp));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return replacements;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static List<int> GetPatternPositions(string pattern, int maxIndex, char excludeCharacter)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            List<int> positions = new List<int>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < maxIndex; i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (pattern[i] != excludeCharacter)Di2015NewLine                    positions.Add(i);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return positions;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static class ArrayUtilityDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public static List<T[]> CreateSubsets<T>(T[] originalArray)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            List<T[]> subsets = new List<T[]>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < originalArray.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                int subsetCount = subsets.Count;Di2015NewLine                subsets.Add(new T[] { originalArray[i] });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                for (int j = 0; j < subsetCount; j++)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    T[] newSubset = new T[subsets[j].Length + 1];Di2015NewLine                    subsets[j].CopyTo(newSubset, 0);Di2015NewLine                    newSubset[newSubset.Length - 1] = originalArray[i];Di2015NewLine                    subsets.Add(newSubset);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return subsets;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2485016Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static bool IsPandigital(int n)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int digits = 0; int count = 0; int tmp;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (; n > 0; n /= 10, ++count)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if ((tmp = digits) == (digits |= 1 << (n - ((n / 10) * 10) - 1)))Di2015NewLine                return false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return digits == (1 << count) - 1;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static void Main()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int pans = 0;Di2015NewLine        Stopwatch sw = new Stopwatch();Di2015NewLine        sw.Start();Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 123456789; i <= 123987654; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (IsPandigital(i))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                pans++;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        sw.Stop();Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("{0}pcs, {1}ms", pans, sw.ElapsedMilliseconds);Di2015NewLine        Console.ReadKey();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
2485016Di2015UniqueSeparatorconst int min = 1023456789;Di2015NewLineconst int expected = 1023;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestatic bool IsPandigital(int n)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (n >= min)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int digits = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (; n > 0; n /= 10)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            digits |= 1 << (n - ((n / 10) * 10));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return digits == expected;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return false;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
2485016Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic partial class PermutationDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Generates permutations.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <typeparam name="T">Type of items to permute.</typeparam>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="items">Array of items. Will not be modified.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="comparer">Optional comparer to use.Di2015NewLine    /// If a <paramref name="comparer"/> is supplied, Di2015NewLine    /// permutations will be ordered according to the Di2015NewLine    /// <paramref name="comparer"/>Di2015NewLine    /// </param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns>Permutations of input items.</returns>Di2015NewLine    public static IEnumerable<IEnumerable<T>> Permute<T>(T[] items, IComparer<T> comparer)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int length = items.Length;Di2015NewLine        IntPair[] transform = new IntPair[length];Di2015NewLine        if (comparer == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //No comparer. Start with an identity transform.Di2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < length; i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                transform[i] = new IntPair(i, i);Di2015NewLine            };Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //Figure out where we are in the sequence of all permutationsDi2015NewLine            int[] initialorder = new int[length];Di2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < length; i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                initialorder[i] = i;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            Array.Sort(initialorder, delegate(int x, int y)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return comparer.Compare(items[x], items[y]);Di2015NewLine            });Di2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < length; i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                transform[i] = new IntPair(initialorder[i], i);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            //Handle duplicatesDi2015NewLine            for (int i = 1; i < length; i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (comparer.Compare(Di2015NewLine                    items[transform[i - 1].Second], Di2015NewLine                    items[transform[i].Second]) == 0)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    transform[i].First = transform[i - 1].First;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        yield return ApplyTransform(items, transform);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        while (true)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //Ref: E. W. Dijkstra, A Discipline of Programming, Prentice-Hall, 1997Di2015NewLine            //Find the largest partition from the back that is in decreasing (non-icreasing) orderDi2015NewLine            int decreasingpart = length - 2;Di2015NewLine            for (;decreasingpart >= 0 && Di2015NewLine                transform[decreasingpart].First >= transform[decreasingpart + 1].First;Di2015NewLine                --decreasingpart) ;Di2015NewLine            //The whole sequence is in decreasing order, finishedDi2015NewLine            if (decreasingpart < 0) yield break;Di2015NewLine            //Find the smallest element in the decreasing partition that is Di2015NewLine            //greater than (or equal to) the item in front of the decreasing partitionDi2015NewLine            int greater = length - 1;Di2015NewLine            for (;greater > decreasingpart && Di2015NewLine                transform[decreasingpart].First >= transform[greater].First; Di2015NewLine                greater--) ;Di2015NewLine            //Swap the twoDi2015NewLine            Swap(ref transform[decreasingpart], ref transform[greater]);Di2015NewLine            //Reverse the decreasing partitionDi2015NewLine            Array.Reverse(transform, decreasingpart + 1, length - decreasingpart - 1);Di2015NewLine            yield return ApplyTransform(items, transform);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #region OverloadsDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static IEnumerable<IEnumerable<T>> Permute<T>(T[] items)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return Permute(items, null);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static IEnumerable<IEnumerable<T>> Permute<T>(IEnumerable<T> items, IComparer<T> comparer)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        List<T> list = new List<T>(items);Di2015NewLine        return Permute(list.ToArray(), comparer);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static IEnumerable<IEnumerable<T>> Permute<T>(IEnumerable<T> items)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return Permute(items, null);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #endregion OverloadsDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #region UtilityDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static IEnumerable<T> ApplyTransform<T>(Di2015NewLine        T[] items, Di2015NewLine        IntPair[] transform)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < transform.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            yield return items[transform[i].Second];Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static void Swap<T>(ref T x, ref T y)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        T tmp = x;Di2015NewLine        x = y;Di2015NewLine        y = tmp;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public struct IntPairDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public IntPair(int first, int second)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            this.First = first;Di2015NewLine            this.Second = second;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        public int First;Di2015NewLine        public int Second;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #endregionDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static void Main()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int pans = 0;Di2015NewLine        int[] digits = new int[] { 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 9 };Di2015NewLine        Stopwatch sw = new Stopwatch();Di2015NewLine        sw.Start();Di2015NewLine        foreach (var p in Permutation.Permute(digits))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            pans++;Di2015NewLine            if (pans == 720) break;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        sw.Stop();Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("{0}pcs, {1}ms", pans, sw.ElapsedMilliseconds);Di2015NewLine        Console.ReadKey();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
2485042Di2015UniqueSeparatorinternal interface ILoadValuesDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    void LoadValues<TKey, TValue>(IDictionary<TKey, TValue> values);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class Base : ILoadValuesDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    void ILoadValues.LoadValues<TKey, TValue>(IDictionary<TKey, TValue> values)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Load values.Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class MyClass<T>Di2015NewLine    where T : Base, new()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public T CreateObject(IDictionary<string,object> values)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        ILoadValues obj = new T();Di2015NewLine        obj.LoadValues(values);Di2015NewLine        return (T)obj;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2486079Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class EnumerableExtensionsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static IEnumerable<T> Zip<T>(Di2015NewLine        this IEnumerable<IEnumerable<T>> sequences,Di2015NewLine        Func<IEnumerable<T>, T> aggregate)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var enumerators = sequences.Select(s => s.GetEnumerator()).ToArray();Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            while (enumerators.All(e => e.MoveNext()))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                var items = enumerators.Select(e => e.Current);Di2015NewLine                yield return aggregate(items);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        finallyDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            foreach (var enumerator in enumerators)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                enumerator.Dispose();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2489738Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass UpgradingStream : StreamDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  // state pattern lives in the problem...Di2015NewLine  private abstract class InternalStateDi2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    private readonly Stream _underlyingStream;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected InternalState(Stream underlyingStream)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      _underlyingStream = underlyingStream;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    internal Stream GetUnderlyingStream()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      return _underlyingStream;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // template method lives in the implementation of this state patternDi2015NewLine    internal InternalState Seek(long offset, SeekOrigin origin, out long result)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      result = _underlyingStream.Seek(offset, origin);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      return GetNextState();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    internal InternalState SetPosition(long value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      _underlyingStream.Position = value;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      return GetNextState();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    internal InternalState SetLength(long value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      _underlyingStream.SetLength(value);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      return GetNextState();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    internal InternalState Write(byte[] buffer, int offset, int count)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      _underlyingStream.Write(buffer, offset, count);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      return GetNextState();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected abstract InternalState GetNextState();Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  private class InMemoryOnly : InternalStateDi2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    private readonly Func<Stream> _getUpgradedStream;Di2015NewLine    private readonly int _threshold;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private InMemoryOnly(int threshold, Func<Stream> getUpgradedStream)Di2015NewLine      : base(new MemoryStream(threshold))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      _threshold = threshold;Di2015NewLine      _getUpgradedStream = getUpgradedStream;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    internal static InternalState GetInstance(int threshold, Func<Stream> getUpgradedStream)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      return new InMemoryOnly(threshold, getUpgradedStream);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected override InternalState GetNextState()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      if (GetUnderlyingStream().Length > _threshold)Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine        var newStream = _getUpgradedStream();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        CopyStream(newStream);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return Unrestricted.GetInstance(newStream);Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      return this;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void CopyStream(Stream newStream)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      var originalPosition = GetUnderlyingStream().Position;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      GetUnderlyingStream().Position = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      int bytesRead;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      var buffer = new byte[65536];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      while ((bytesRead = GetUnderlyingStream().Read(buffer, 0, buffer.Length)) != 0)Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine        newStream.Write(buffer, 0, bytesRead);Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      newStream.Position = originalPosition;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  private class Unrestricted : InternalStateDi2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    private Unrestricted(Stream underlyingStream)Di2015NewLine      : base(underlyingStream)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    internal static Unrestricted GetInstance(Stream stream)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      return new Unrestricted(stream);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected override InternalState GetNextState()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      // state never changes once we are in a file or whateverDi2015NewLine      return this;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  private InternalState _state;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  private UpgradingStream(int threshold, Func<Stream> getMoreEfficientStream)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    _state = InMemoryOnly.GetInstance(threshold, getMoreEfficientStream);Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  internal static Stream GetInstance(int threshold, Func<Stream> getMoreEfficientStream)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    return new UpgradingStream(threshold, getMoreEfficientStream);Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public override bool 2489988Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static T DeepClone<T>( this T source ) where T : class, new()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return source.DeepClone( null );Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
2489988Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static T DeepClone<T>( this T source, Dictionary<object, object> map )Di2015NewLine    where T : class, new()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Type type = source.GetType();Di2015NewLine    IList<FieldInfo> fields = type.Fields( Flags.StaticInstanceAnyVisibility );Di2015NewLine    var clone = type.CreateInstance() as T;Di2015NewLine    map = map ?? new Dictionary<object, object>();Di2015NewLine    map[ source ] = clone;Di2015NewLine    object[] values = fields.Select( f => GetValue( f, source, map ) ).ToArray();Di2015NewLine    for( int i = 0; i < fields.Count; i++ )Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        fields[ i ].Set( clone, values[ i ] );Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return clone;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static object GetValue( FieldInfo field, object source, Dictionary<object, object> map )Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    object result = field.Get( source );Di2015NewLine    object clone;Di2015NewLine    if( map.TryGetValue( result, out clone ) )Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return clone;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    bool follow = result != null && result.GetType().IsClass && result.GetType() != typeof(string);Di2015NewLine    return follow ? result.DeepClone( map ) : result;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2495354Di2015UniqueSeparator    public IList<string> ChunkifyText(string bigString, int maxSize, char[] punctuation)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        List<string> results = new List<string>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        string chunk;Di2015NewLine        int startIndex = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        while (startIndex < bigString.Length)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (startIndex + maxSize + 1 > bigString.Length)Di2015NewLine                chunk = bigString.Substring(startIndex);Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine                chunk = bigString.Substring(startIndex, maxSize);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            int endIndex = chunk.LastIndexOfAny(punctuation);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (endIndex < 0)Di2015NewLine                endIndex = chunk.LastIndexOf(" ");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (endIndex < 0)Di2015NewLine                endIndex = Math.Min(maxSize - 1, chunk.Length - 1);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            results.Add(chunk.Substring(0, endIndex + 1));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            startIndex += endIndex + 1;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return results;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

Di2015NewLine    // You might be able to use the SpreadSheetDocument.Parts.Count() to do this.Di2015NewLine    // i.e. string relationshipID = "rId" + (spreadsheetDocument.Parts.Count() + 1).ToString();Di2015NewLine    string rId = "rId6";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Sheet.Name and Sheet.SheetId must be unique within the spreadsheet.Di2015NewLine    Sheet sheet = new Sheet() { Name = "Sheet4", SheetId = 4U, Id = rId };Di2015NewLine    workbookPart.Workbook.Sheets.Append(sheet);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    WorksheetPart worksheetPart = workbookPart.AddNewPart<WorksheetPart>(rId);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Worksheet worksheet = new Worksheet();Di2015NewLine    worksheet.AddNamespaceDeclaration("r", "http://schemas.openxmlformats.org/officeDocument/2006/relationships");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // I don't know what SheetDimension.Reference is used for, it doesn't seem to change the resulting xml.Di2015NewLine    SheetDimension sheetDimension = new SheetDimension() { Reference = "A1:A3" };Di2015NewLine    SheetViews sheetViews = new SheetViews();Di2015NewLine    // If more than one SheetView.TabSelected is set to true, it looks like Excel just picks the first one.Di2015NewLine    SheetView sheetView = new SheetView() { TabSelected = false, WorkbookViewId = 0U };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // I don't know what Selection.ActiveCell is used for, it doesn't seem to change the resulting xml.Di2015NewLine    Selection selection = new Selection() { ActiveCell = "A1", SequenceOfReferences = new ListValue<StringValue>() { InnerText = "A1" } };Di2015NewLine    sheetView.Append(selection);Di2015NewLine    sheetViews.Append(sheetView);Di2015NewLine    SheetFormatProperties sheetFormatProperties = new SheetFormatProperties() { DefaultRowHeight = 15D };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    SheetData sheetData = new SheetData();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // I don't know what the InnerText of Row.Spans is used for. It doesn't seem to change the resulting xml.Di2015NewLine    Row row = new Row() { RowIndex = 1U, Spans = new ListValue<StringValue>() { InnerText = "1:3" } };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Cell cell1 = new Cell() { CellReference = "A1", DataType = CellValues.Number, CellValue = new CellValue("99") };Di2015NewLine    Cell cell2 = new Cell() { CellReference = "B1", DataType = CellValues.Number, CellValue = new CellValue("55") };Di2015NewLine    Cell cell3 = new Cell() { CellReference = "C1", DataType = CellValues.Number, CellValue = new CellValue("33") };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    row.Append(cell1);Di2015NewLine    row.Append(cell2);Di2015NewLine    row.Append(cell3);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    sheetData.Append(row);Di2015NewLine    PageMargins pageMargins = new PageMargins() { Left = 0.7D, Right = 0.7D, Top = 0.7D, Bottom = 0.75D, Header = 0.3D, Footer = 0.3D };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    worksheet.Append(sheetDimension);Di2015NewLine    worksheet.Append(sheetViews);Di2015NewLine    worksheet.Append(sheetFormatProperties);Di2015NewLine    worksheet.Append(sheetData);Di2015NewLine    worksheet.Append(pageMargins);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    worksheetPart.Worksheet = worksheet;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2496750Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static string GetQueryStringWithoutKey(HttpRequest request, string keyToRemove) {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Assert keyToRemove is not null.Di2015NewLine    if (keyToRemove == null) {Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentNullException("keyToRemove");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // If the QueryString has no data, simply return an empty string.Di2015NewLine    if (request.QueryString.AllKeys.Length == 0) {Di2015NewLine        return string.Empty;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Reconstruct the QueryString with everything except the existing key/value pair.Di2015NewLine    StringBuilder queryStringWithoutKey = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < request.QueryString.AllKeys.Length; i++) {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Only append data that is not the given key/value pair.Di2015NewLine        if (request.QueryString.AllKeys[i] != null &&Di2015NewLine            request.QueryString.AllKeys[i].ToLower() != keyToRemove.ToLower()) {Di2015NewLine            queryStringWithoutKey.Append(request.QueryString.AllKeys[i]);Di2015NewLine            queryStringWithoutKey.Append("=");Di2015NewLine            queryStringWithoutKey.Append(request.QueryString[i]);Di2015NewLine            queryStringWithoutKey.Append("&");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // We might have had a key, but if the only key was Message, then there is noDi2015NewLine    // data to return for the QueryString.Di2015NewLine    if (queryStringWithoutKey.Length == 0) {Di2015NewLine        return string.Empty;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Remove trailing ampersand.Di2015NewLine    return queryStringWithoutKey.ToString().TrimEnd('&');Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2504932Di2015UniqueSeparator!=
2504932Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IList<string> GetDifferingProperties(object source, object target)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  var sourceType = source.GetType();Di2015NewLine  var sourceProperties = sourceType.GetProperties();Di2015NewLine  var targetType = target.GetType();Di2015NewLine  var targetProperties = targetType.GetProperties();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  var result = new List<string>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  foreach (var property inDi2015NewLine      (from s in sourcePropertiesDi2015NewLine       from t in targetPropertiesDi2015NewLine       where s.Name == t.Name &&Di2015NewLine       s.PropertyType == t.PropertyType &&Di2015NewLine       !Equals(s.GetValue(source, null), t.GetValue(target, null))Di2015NewLine       select new { Source = s, Target = t }))Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    // it's up to you to decide how primitive is primitive enoughDi2015NewLine    if (IsPrimitive(property.Source.PropertyType))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      result.Add(property.Source.Name);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      foreach (var subProperty in GetDifferingProperties(Di2015NewLine          property.Source.GetValue(source, null),Di2015NewLine          property.Target.GetValue(target, null)))Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine        result.Add(property.Source.Name + "." + subProperty);Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  return result;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static bool IsPrimitive(Type type)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  return type == typeof(string) || type == typeof(int);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2506618Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class IISHandler1 : IHttpHandlerDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public bool IsReusableDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return true; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void ProcessRequest(HttpContext context)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int theID;Di2015NewLine        if (!int.TryParse(context.Request.QueryString["id"], out theID))Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentException("No parameter specified");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        context.Response.ContentType = "image/jpeg"; // or gif/png depending on what type of image you haveDi2015NewLine        Stream strm = DisplayImage(theID);Di2015NewLine        byte[] buffer = new byte[2048];Di2015NewLine        int byteSeq = strm.Read(buffer, 0, 2048);Di2015NewLine        while (byteSeq > 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            context.Response.OutputStream.Write(buffer, 0, byteSeq);Di2015NewLine            byteSeq = strm.Read(buffer, 0, 2048);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Stream DisplayImage(int theID)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            SqlConnection connection = new SqlConnection(ConfigurationManager.ConnectionStrings["ConnectionString"].ConnectionString.ToString());Di2015NewLine            string sql = "SELECT image FROM Table1 WHERE id = @ID";Di2015NewLine            using (SqlCommand cmd = new SqlCommand(sql, connection) { CommandType = CommandType.Text })Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                cmd.Parameters.AddWithValue("@ID", theID);Di2015NewLine                connection.Open();Di2015NewLine                object theImg = cmd.ExecuteScalar();Di2015NewLine                return new MemoryStream((byte[]) theImg);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catchDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return null;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2507084Di2015UniqueSeparator    private static double Real48ToDouble(byte[] real48)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (real48[0] == 0)Di2015NewLine            return 0.0; // Null exponent = 0Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        double exponent = real48[0] - 129.0;Di2015NewLine        double mantissa = 0.0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int i = 1; i < 5; i++) // loop through bytes 1-4Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            mantissa += real48[i];Di2015NewLine            mantissa *= 0.00390625; // mantissa /= 256Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        mantissa += (real48[5] & 0x7F);Di2015NewLine        mantissa *= 0.0078125; // mantissa /= 128Di2015NewLine        mantissa += 1.0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if ((real48[5] & 0x80) == 0x80) // Sign bit checkDi2015NewLine            mantissa = -mantissa;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return mantissa * Math.Pow(2.0, exponent);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

2510411Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static DateTime EasterSunday(int year)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int day = 0;Di2015NewLine    int month = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int g = year % 19;Di2015NewLine    int c = year / 100;Di2015NewLine    int h = (c - (int)(c / 4) - (int)((8 * c + 13) / 25) + 19 * g + 15) % 30;Di2015NewLine    int i = h - (int)(h / 28) * (1 - (int)(h / 28) * (int)(29 / (h + 1)) * (int)((21 - g) / 11));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    day   = i - ((year + (int)(year / 4) + i + 2 - c + (int)(c / 4)) % 7) + 28;Di2015NewLine    month = 3;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (day > 31)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        month++;Di2015NewLine        day -= 31;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return new DateTime(year, month, day);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2522494Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.IO;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing MSOutlook = Microsoft.Office.Interop.Outlook;Di2015NewLineusing System.Runtime.InteropServices;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace Outlook2003KnowledgeBaseAddIn.SetupDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public sealed class FolderHomePageDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// List of web view files that have been written out during this Outlook intanceDi2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        private static List<string> listWebViewFiles = new List<string>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Registers a specific managed type as a folder home page. Returns a file path for the folder home pageDi2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="viewType">Type of the home page control. Di2015NewLine        /// Control must be ComVisible should be registered safe for scripting</param>Di2015NewLine        /// <returns>file path to the folder home page</returns>Di2015NewLine        public static string RegisterType(Type viewType)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (viewType == null)Di2015NewLine                return null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //TODO: ensure that viewType inherits from System.Windows.Forms.ControlDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //Create the Local App Data directory for the Web view files to reside inDi2015NewLine            string webViewDirectory = Path.Combine(Environment.GetFolderPath(Environment.SpecialFolder.LocalApplicationData), Properties.Resources.WebViewDirectoryName);Di2015NewLine            if (Directory.Exists(webViewDirectory) == false)Di2015NewLine                Directory.CreateDirectory(webViewDirectory);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //Create the web view file name based on the viewType guid in the web view directoryDi2015NewLine            string webViewFile = Path.Combine(webViewDirectory, viewType.GUID.ToString("N") + ".htm");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //if the file has been written out already in this session, returnDi2015NewLine            if (listWebViewFiles.Contains(webViewFile))Di2015NewLine                return webViewFile;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //If the file exists, delete it (for versioning reasons)Di2015NewLine            if (File.Exists(webViewFile))Di2015NewLine                File.Delete(webViewFile);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //Open a file stream and text writer for the Web view streamDi2015NewLine            FileStream stm = new FileStream(webViewFile, FileMode.Create, FileAccess.Write);Di2015NewLine            TextWriter writer = new StreamWriter(stm, System.Text.Encoding.ASCII);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //Look to see if the viewType has an init method that takes a single Outlook App parameterDi2015NewLine            System.Reflection.MethodInfo initInfo = viewType.GetMethod("Initialize", new Type[] { typeof(MSOutlook.Application) });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //If the viewType doesn't have an Init method, just write out the html page headerDi2015NewLine            //TODO move HTML code to resource stringsDi2015NewLine            if (initInfo == null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                writer.WriteLine("<html><body rightmargin = '0' leftmargin ='0' topmargin ='0' bottommargin = '0'>");Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            //If the viewType does have an Init method, write script to trap the Body.OnLoad event and call the Init methodDi2015NewLine            //passing in the window.external.OutlookApplication object as the parameterDi2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                writer.WriteLine("<html><body rightmargin = '0' leftmargin ='0' topmargin ='0' bottommargin = '0' onload='OnBodyLoad()'>");Di2015NewLine                writer.WriteLine("<script>\\n\\tfunction OnBodyLoad()\\n\\t{\\n\\t\\tvar oApp = window.external.OutlookApplication;");Di2015NewLine                writer.WriteLine("\\t\\t{0}.Initialize(oApp);", viewType.Name);Di2015NewLine                writer.WriteLine("\\t}\\n</script>");Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //Write out an object tag that loads up the viewType as a com object via its class idDi2015NewLine            writer.WriteLine("<object classid='clsid:{0}' ID='{1}' VIEWASTEXT width='100%' height='100%'/>", viewType.GUID, viewType.Name);Di2015NewLine            writer.WriteLine("</body></html>");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //Close the fileDi2015NewLine            writer.Close();Di2015NewLine            stm.Close();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //save this file name so we don't write it out multiple times per outlook sessionDi2015NewLine            listWebViewFiles.Add(webViewFile);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return webViewFile;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private const string CATID_SafeForScripting = "7DD95801-9882-11CF-9FA9-00AA006C42C4";Di2015NewLine        private const string CATID_SafeForInitializing = "7DD95802-9882-11CF-9FA9-00AA006C42C4";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        ///    reg.RegisterClassImplCategories(ref clsid, 1, new Guid[] { interfaceSafeForInitializing });Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Unregisters      {Di2015NewLine                throw new System.Configuration.Install.InstallException("Custom Installer Failed", ex);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine       //Utility.FolderHomePage.UnregisterSafeForScripting(typeof(FolderHomePages.AccountToday));Di2015NewLine            FolderHomePage.UnregisterSafeForScripting(typeof(WebViewControl));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private void ConfigureSecurityPolicy()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Find the machine policy levelDi2015NewLine            PolicyLevel machinePolicyLevel = GetMachinePolicyLevel();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Get the install directory of the current installerDi2015NewLine            string assemblyPath = this.Context.Parameters["assemblypath"];Di2015NewLine            string installDirectory =Di2015NewLine                assemblyPath.Substring(0, assemblyPath.LastIndexOf("\\\\"));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (!installDirectory.EndsWith(@"\\"))Di2015NewLine                installDirectory += @"\\";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            installDirectory += "*";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Create the code groupDi2015NewLine            CodeGroup codeGroup = new UnionCodeGroup(Di2015NewLine                new UrlMembershipCondition(installDirectory),Di2015NewLine                new PolicyStatement(new NamedPermissionSet("FullTrust")));Di2015NewLine            codeGroup.Description = Properties.Resources.CasPolicyDescription;Di2015NewLine            codeGroup.Name = Properties.Resources.CasPolicyName;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Add the code groupDi2015NewLine            machinePolicyLevel.RootCodeGroup.AddChild(codeGroup);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Save changesDi2015NewLine            SecurityManager.SavePolicy();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static void DeleteSecurityPolicy()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            PolicyLevel machinePolicy = GetMachinePolicyLevel();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            foreach (CodeGroup codeGroup in machinePolicy.RootCodeGroup.Children)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (codeGroup.Name == Properties.Resources.CasPolicyName)Di2015NewLine                    machinePolicy.RootCodeGroup.RemoveChild(codeGroup);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            SecurityManager.SavePolicy();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static PolicyLevel GetMachinePolicyLevel()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine          PolicyLevel level = (PolicyLevel)policyHierarchy.Current;Di2015NewLine                if (level.Type == PolicyLevelType.Machine)Di2015NewLine                    return level;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            throw new ApplicationException("Could not find Machine Policy level. Code Access Security is not configured for this application.");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2528275Di2015UniqueSeparatorprotected override IKernel CreateKernel()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // The name of the class, e.g. retrieved from a configDi2015NewLine    string moduleName = "MyApp.MyAppTestNinjectModule";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Type.GetType takes a string and tries to find a Type withDi2015NewLine    // the *fully qualified name* - which includes the NamespaceDi2015NewLine    // and possibly also the Assembly if it's in another assemblyDi2015NewLine    Type moduleType = Type.GetType(moduleName);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // If Type.GetType can't find the type, it returns NullDi2015NewLine    NinjectModule module;Di2015NewLine    if (moduleType != null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Activator.CreateInstance calls the parameterless constructorDi2015NewLine        // of the given Type to create an instace. As this returns objectDi2015NewLine        // you need to cast it to the desired type, NinjectModuleDi2015NewLine        module = Activator.CreateInstance(moduleType) as NinjectModule;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // If the Type was not found, you need to handle that. You could insteadDi2015NewLine        // initialize Module through some default type, for exampleDi2015NewLine        // module = new MyAppDefaultNinjectModule();Di2015NewLine        // or error out - whatever suits your needsDi2015NewLine        throw new MyAppConfigException(Di2015NewLine             string.Format("Could not find Type: '{0}'", moduleName),Di2015NewLine             "injectModule");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // As module is an instance of a NinjectModule (or derived) class, weDi2015NewLine    // can use it to create Ninject's StandardKernelDi2015NewLine    return new StandardKernel(module);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2532704Di2015UniqueSeparatorstring EncryptOrDecrypt(string text, string key)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var result = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for (int c = 0; c < text.Length; c++)Di2015NewLine        result.Append((char)((uint)text[c] ^ (uint)key[c % key.Length]));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return result.ToString();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
2532704Di2015UniqueSeparatorstring EncryptOrDecrypt(string text, string key)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var result = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for (int c = 0; c < text.Length; c++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // take next character from stringDi2015NewLine        char character = text[c];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // cast to a uintDi2015NewLine        uint charCode = (uint)character;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // figure out which character to take from the keyDi2015NewLine        int keyPosition = c % key.Length; // use modulo to "wrap round"Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // take the key characterDi2015NewLine        char keyChar = key[keyPosition];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // cast it to a uint alsoDi2015NewLine        uint keyCode = (uint)keyChar;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // perform XOR on the two character codesDi2015NewLine        uint combinedCode = charCode ^ keyCode;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // cast back to a charDi2015NewLine        char combinedChar = (char)combinedCode;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // add to the resultDi2015NewLine        result.Append(combineChar);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return result.ToString();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2532732Di2015UniqueSeparatorreader.GetName(i) - this returns the name of the columnDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinereader.GetValue(i).ToString() - this returns the value of the column as a stringDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinegetColumnName - a function the will return true if a column name can be gottenDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine?: - the conditional operator. If the expression before the ? is true, the expression to the left of the : is used, otherwise the one on the rightDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineString.Format("<td>{0}</td", arg) - this will output "<td>arg</td>" (btw - your code is wrong, the ) should not be just after the first string)Di2015NewLine

LOSS OF USE, DATA, OR PROFITS; OR BUSINESS Di2015NewLine    INTERRUPTION) HOWEVER CAUSED AND ON ANY THEORY OF LIABILITY, WHETHER IN CONTRACT, STRICT LIABILITY, Di2015NewLine    OR TORT (INCLUDING NEGLIGENCE OR OTHERWISE) ARISING IN ANY WAY OUT OF THE USE OF THIS SOFTWARE, EVEN Di2015NewLine    IF ADVISED OF THE POSSIBILITY OF SUCH DAMAGE.</textarea>Di2015NewLine*/Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine(function(window) {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    $type = String;Di2015NewLine    $type.__typeName = 'String';Di2015NewLine    $type.__class = true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    $prototype = $type.prototype;Di2015NewLine    $prototype.endsWith = function String$endsWith(suffix) {Di2015NewLine        /// <summary>Determines whether the end of this instance matches the specified string.</summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="suffix" type="String">A string to compare to.</param>Di2015NewLine        /// <returns type="Boolean">true if suffix matches the end of this instance; otherwise, false.</returns>Di2015NewLine        return (this.substr(this.length - suffix.length) === suffix);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    $prototype.startsWith = function String$startsWith(prefix) {Di2015NewLine        /// <summary >Determines whether the beginning of this instance matches the specified string.</summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="prefix" type="String">The String to compare.</param>Di2015NewLine        /// <returns type="Boolean">true if prefix matches the beginning of this string; otherwise, false.</returns>Di2015NewLine        return (this.substr(0, prefix.length) === prefix);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    $prototype.trim = function String$trim() {Di2015NewLine        /// <summary >Removes all leading and trailing white-space characters from the current String object.</summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <returns type="String">The string that remains after all white-space characters are removed from the start and end of the current String object.</returns>Di2015NewLine        return this.replace(/^\\s+|\\s+$/g, '');Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    $prototype.trimEnd = function String$trimEnd() {Di2015NewLine        /// <summary >Removes all trailing white spaces from the current String object.</summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <returns type="String">The string that remains after all white-space characters are removed from the end of the current String object.</returns>Di2015NewLine        return this.replace(/\\s+$/, '');Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    $prototype.trimStart = function String$trimStart() {Di2015NewLine        /// <summary >Removes all leading white spaces from the current String object.</summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <returns type="String">The string that remains after all white-space characters are removed from the start of the current String object.</returns>Di2015NewLine        return this.replace(/^\\s+/, '');Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    $type.format = function String$format(format, args) {Di2015NewLine        /// <summary>Replaces the format items in a specified String with the text equivalents of the values of   corresponding object instances. The invariant culture will be used to format dates and numbers.</summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="format" type="String">A format string.</param>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="args" parameterArray="true" mayBeNull="true">The objects to format.</param>Di2015NewLine        /// <returns type="String">A copy of format in which the format items have been replaced by the   string equivalent of the corresponding instances of object arguments.</returns>Di2015NewLine        return String._toFormattedString(false, arguments);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    $type._toFormattedString = function String$_toFormattedString(useLocale, args) {Di2015NewLine        var result = '';Di2015NewLine        var format = args[0];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (var i = 0; ; ) {Di2015NewLine            // Find the next opening or closing braceDi2015NewLine            var open = format.indexOf('{', i);Di2015NewLine            var close = format.indexOf('}', i);Di2015NewLine            if ((open < 0) && (close < 0)) {Di2015NewLine                // Not found: copy the end of the string and breakDi2015NewLine                result += format.slice(i);Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            if ((close > 0) && ((close < open) || (open < 0))) {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (format.charAt(close + 1) !== '}') {Di2015NewLine                    throw new Error('format stringFormatBraceMismatch');Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                result += format.slice(i, close + 1);Di2015NewLine                i = close + 2;Di2015NewLine                continue;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Copy the string before the braceDi2015NewLine            result += format.slice(i, open);Di2015NewLine            i = open + 1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Check for double braces (which display as one and are not arguments)Di2015NewLine            if (format.charAt(i) === '{') {Di2015NewLine                result += '{';Di2015NewLine                i++;Di2015NewLine                continue;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (close < 0) throw new Error('format stringFormatBraceMismatch');Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Find the closing braceDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Get the string between the braces, and split it around the ':' (if any)Di2015NewLine            var brace = format.substring(i, close);Di2015NewLine            var colonIndex = brace.indexOf(':');Di2015NewLine            var argNumber = parseInt((colonIndex < 0) ? brace : brace.substring(0, colonIndex), 10) + 1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (isNaN(argNumber)) throw new Error('format stringFormatInvalid');Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var argFormat = (colonIndex < 0) ? '' : brace.substring(colonIndex + 1);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var arg = args[argNumber];Di2015NewLine            if (typeof (arg) === "undefined" || arg === null) {Di2015NewLine                arg = '';Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // If it has a toFormattedString method, call it.  Otherwise, call toString()Di2015NewLine            if (arg.toFormattedString) {Di2015NewLine                result += arg.toFormattedString(argFormat);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            else if (useLocale && arg.localeFormat) {Di2015NewLine                result += arg.localeFormat(argFormat);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            else if (arg.format) {Di2015NewLine                result += arg.format(argFormat);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine                result += arg.toString();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            i = close + 1;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return result;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine})(window);Di2015NewLine

2537544Di2015UniqueSeparatorPrivate Sub Button1_Click(ByVal sender As System.Object, ByVal e As System.EventArgs) Handles Button1.ClickDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Dim someIP As Net.IPAddress = Net.IPAddress.Parse("192.168.1.10")Di2015NewLine    Dim someMASK As Net.IPAddress = Net.IPAddress.Parse("255.255.255.240")Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Dim ipL As Long = IPtoLong(someIP)Di2015NewLine    Dim maskL As Long = IPtoLong(someMASK)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    'Convert  Mask to CIDR(1-30)Di2015NewLine    Dim oneBit As Long = &H80000000LDi2015NewLine    Dim CIDR As Integer = 0Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    For x As Integer = 31 To 0 Step -1Di2015NewLine        If (maskL And oneBit) = oneBit Then CIDR += 1 Else Exit ForDi2015NewLine        oneBit = oneBit >> 1Di2015NewLine    NextDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Dim answer As String = LongToIp(ipL And maskL) & " /" & CIDR.ToStringDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineEnd SubDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinePublic Function IPtoLong(ByVal theIP As Net.IPAddress) As Long 'convert IP to numberDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Dim IPb() As Byte = theIP.GetAddressBytes 'get the octetsDi2015NewLine    Dim addr As Long 'accumulator for addressDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    For x As Integer = 0 To 3Di2015NewLine        addr = addr Or (CLng(IPb(x)) << (3 - x) * 8)Di2015NewLine    NextDi2015NewLine    Return addrDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineEnd FunctionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinePublic Function LongToIp(ByVal theIP As Long) As String 'convert number back to IPDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Dim IPb(3) As Byte '4 octetsDi2015NewLine    Dim addr As String = "" 'accumulator for addressDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Dim mask8 As Long = MaskFromCidr(8) 'create eight bit maskDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    For x = 0 To 3 'get the octetsDi2015NewLine        IPb(x) = CByte((theIP And mask8) >> ((3 - x) * 8))Di2015NewLine        mask8 = mask8 >> 8Di2015NewLine        addr &= IPb(x).ToString & "." 'add current octet to stringDi2015NewLine    NextDi2015NewLine    Return addr.TrimEnd("."c)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineEnd FunctionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinePrivate Function MaskFromCidr(ByVal CIDR As Integer) As LongDi2015NewLine    MaskFromCidr = CLng(2 ^ ((32 - CIDR)) - 1) Xor 4294967295LDi2015NewLineEnd FunctionDi2015NewLine

2538308Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass TestDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static void Main()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine    //STEP 1: Create a wait handleDi2015NewLine        ManualResetEvent[] events = new ManualResetEvent[10];//Create a wait handleDi2015NewLine        for (int i=0; i < events.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            events[i] = new ManualResetEvent(false);Di2015NewLine            Runner r = new Runner(events[i], i); Di2015NewLine            new Thread(new ThreadStart(r.Run)).Start();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //STEP 2: Register for the events to wait forDi2015NewLine        int index = WaitHandle.WaitAny(events); //wait here for any event and print following line.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine ("***** The winner is {0} *****", Di2015NewLine                           index);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        WaitHandle.WaitAll(events); //Wait for all of the threads to finish, that is, to call their cooresponding `.Set()` method.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine ("All finished!");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass RunnerDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static readonly object rngLock = new object();Di2015NewLine    static Random rng = new Random();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    ManualResetEvent ev;Di2015NewLine    int id;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    internal Runner (ManualResetEvent ev, int id)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.ev = ev;//Wait handle associated to each object, thread in this case.Di2015NewLine        this.id = id;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    internal void Run()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine    //STEP 3: Do some workDi2015NewLine        for (int i=0; i < 10; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int sleepTime;Di2015NewLine            // Not sure about the thread safety of Random...Di2015NewLine            lock (rngLock)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                sleepTime = rng.Next(2000);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            Thread.Sleep(sleepTime);Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine ("Runner {0} at stage {1}",Di2015NewLine                               id, i);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //STEP 4: Im done!Di2015NewLine        ev.Set();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

</summary>Di2015NewLine/// <param name="list">The IList interface into the List</param>Di2015NewLine/// <returns>A JSON string of the list</returns>Di2015NewLinepublic string SerializeList(IList list) {Di2015NewLine    string result = null;Di2015NewLine    if (list != null) {Di2015NewLine        IEnumerator it = list.GetEnumerator();Di2015NewLine        StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine        long len = list.Count;Di2015NewLine        sb.Append("[");Di2015NewLine        while (it.MoveNext()) {Di2015NewLine            if (it.Current is IList) {Di2015NewLine                sb.Append(SerializeList((IList)it.Current));Di2015NewLine            } else if (it.Current is IDictionary) {Di2015NewLine       --len;Di2015NewLine            if (len > 0) sb.Append(",");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        sb.Append("]");Di2015NewLine        result = sb.ToString();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return result;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// Returns a stringified key of the objectDi2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLine/// <param name="o">The key value</param>Di2015NewLine/// <returns></returns>Di2015NewLinepublic string SerializeKey(object o) {Di2015NewLine    return string.Format("\\"{0}\\"", o); Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// Serializes a dictionary into JSONDi2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLine/// <param name="dict">The IDictionary interface into the Dictionary</param>Di2015NewLine/// <returns>A JSON string of the Dictionary</returns>Di2015NewLinepublic string SerializeDictionary(IDictionary dict) {Di2015NewLine    string result = null;Di2015NewLine    if (dict != null) {Di2015NewLine        IDictionaryEnumerator it = dict.GetEnumerator();Di2015NewLine        StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine        long len = dict.Count;Di2015NewLine IList) {Di2015NewLine                sb.Append(SerializeList((IList)it.Value));Di2015NewLine            } else if (it.Value is IDictionary) {Di2015NewLine return result;Di2015NewLine}   Di2015NewLine

2541405Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class ConcurrentBufferDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private readonly byte[] buffer;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    internal byte[] GetBuffer() { return buffer; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private List<BufferLock> locks = new List<BufferLock>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public ConcurrentBuffer(int bufferSize)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        buffer = new byte[bufferSize];Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public BufferLock AcquireLock(int startIndex, int endIndex)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (startIndex < 0) throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException("startIndex");Di2015NewLine        if (startIndex > endIndex || endIndex >= buffer.Length) throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException("endIndex");Di2015NewLine        lock (buffer)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            foreach (var l in locks)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (!(endIndex < l.StartIndex || startIndex > l.EndIndex))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    return null;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            var bl = new BufferLock(startIndex, endIndex, this);Di2015NewLine            locks.Add(bl);Di2015NewLine            return bl;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void ReleaseLock(BufferLock lck)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        lock (buffer)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            locks.Remove(lck);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public class BufferLockDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public int StartIndex { get; private set; }Di2015NewLine        public int EndIndex { get; private set; }Di2015NewLine        public ConcurrentBuffer TargetBuffer { get; private set; }Di2015NewLine        public MemoryStream Stream { get; private set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        internal BufferLock(int startIndex, int endIndex, ConcurrentBuffer buffer)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            StartIndex = startIndex;Di2015NewLine            EndIndex = endIndex;Di2015NewLine            TargetBuffer = buffer;Di2015NewLine            Stream = new MemoryStream(buffer.GetBuffer(), startIndex, endIndex - startIndex, true);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public void Release()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Stream.Dispose();Di2015NewLine            TargetBuffer.ReleaseLock(this);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        ConcurrentBuffer cb = new ConcurrentBuffer(32000);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        byte[] myData = { 32, 13, 53, 29, 50 };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // l1 will acquire a lockDi2015NewLine        var l1 = cb.AcquireLock(0, 50); Di2015NewLine        if (l1 != null) l1.Stream.Write(myData, 0, myData.Length);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // l2 will fail because l1 has part of its range lockedDi2015NewLine        var l2 = cb.AcquireLock(30, 70);Di2015NewLine        if (l2 != null) l2.Stream.Write(myData, 0, myData.Length);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        l1.Release();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // l3 will succeed at locking because l1 has been releasedDi2015NewLine        var l3 = cb.AcquireLock(40, 5000);Di2015NewLine        if (l3 != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            while (l3.Stream.Position + myData.Length <= l3.Stream.Length)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                l3.Stream.Write(myData, 0, myData.Length);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        l3.Release();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

Kill(Player killer)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        DeathsCount++;Di2015NewLine        killer.KillsCount++;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass ExampleDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private readonly Collection<Player> _Players = new Collection<Player>();Di2015NewLine    private bool _IsUpdateEnabled;Di2015NewLine    private int _UpdateTimeout = 1000;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Start()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var frank = new Player("Frank");Di2015NewLine        var tom = new Player("Tom");Di2015NewLine        _Players.Add(frank);Di2015NewLine        _Players.Add(tom);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        _Players.Add(new Player("Bob"));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        _IsUpdateEnabled = true;Di2015NewLine        new Thread(UpdateThreadMethod).Start();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Frank kills Tom ):Di2015NewLine        tom.Kill(frank);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Where is Bob?Di2015NewLine        var bob = _Players.First(p => p.Name == "Bob");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Bob kills FrankDi2015NewLine        frank.Kill(bob);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Tom kills   {Di2015NewLine            foreach (var player in _Players)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (player.IsChanged)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    // update databaseDi2015NewLine                    // e.g. "update stats set kills = @kills, deaths = @deaths where name = @name"Di2015NewLine                    // whereDi2015NewLine                    // @kills is players.KillsCountDi2015NewLine                    // @deaths is player.DeathsCountDi2015NewLine                    // @name is player.NameDi2015NewLine                    player.IsChanged = false;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Thread.Sleep(_UpdateTimeout);Di2015NewLine        }   Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void ShowResults()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        foreach (var player in _Players)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Player 2543724Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class Cloner {Di2015NewLine    private readonly IDictionary<Type, Func<object, object>> _cloneMap =Di2015NewLine            new Dictionary<Type, Func<object, object>>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public T Clone<T>(T source) {Di2015NewLine        Type sourceType = source.GetType();Di2015NewLine        Func<object, object> cloneFunc;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (_cloneMap.TryGetValue(sourceType, out cloneFunc)) {Di2015NewLine            return (T)cloneFunc(source);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (TryGetCopyConstructorCloneFunc(sourceType, out cloneFunc)) {Di2015NewLine            _cloneMap.Add(sourceType, cloneFunc);Di2015NewLine            return (T)cloneFunc(source);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (TryGetICloneableCloneFunc(sourceType, out cloneFunc)) {Di2015NewLine            _cloneMap.Add(sourceType, cloneFunc);Di2015NewLine            return (T)cloneFunc(source);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return default(T);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private bool TryGetCopyConstructorCloneFunc(Type type, Di2015NewLine                    out Func<object, object> cloneFunc) {Di2015NewLine        var constructor = type.GetConstructor(new[] { type });Di2015NewLine        if (constructor == null) {Di2015NewLine            cloneFunc = source => null;Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        cloneFunc = source => constructor.Invoke(new[] { source });Di2015NewLine        return true;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private bool TryGetICloneableCloneFunc(Type type,Di2015NewLine                    out Func<object, object> cloneFunc) {Di2015NewLine        bool isICloneable = typeof(ICloneable).IsAssignableFrom(type);Di2015NewLine        var cloneMethod = type.GetMethod("Clone", new Type[] { });Di2015NewLine        if (!isICloneable || (cloneMethod == null)) {Di2015NewLine            cloneFunc = source => null;Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        cloneFunc = source => cloneMethod.Invoke(source, new object[] {});Di2015NewLine        return true;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2548527Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static bool ImplementsBaseType(IEnumerable objects)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int found = ( from i in objects.GetType().GetInterfaces()Di2015NewLine                 where i.IsGenericType && Di2015NewLine                       i.GetGenericTypeDefinition() == typeof(IEnumerable<>) &&Di2015NewLine                       typeof(MyBaseClass).IsAssignableFrom(i.GetGenericArguments()[0])Di2015NewLine                 select i ).Count();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return (found > 0);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
