2548527Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class ConversionAssistantsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static bool GenericImplementsType(this IEnumerable objects, Type baseType)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        foreach (Type type in objects.GetType().GetInterfaces())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (type.IsGenericType)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (type.GetGenericTypeDefinition() == typeof(IEnumerable<>))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    if (baseType.IsAssignableFrom(type.GetGenericArguments()[0]))Di2015NewLine                        return true;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return false;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
2548542Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static void SignDocument(XmlDocument xmldoc)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    //Get the XML content from the embedded XML privatekey.Di2015NewLine    Stream s = null;Di2015NewLine    string xmlkey = string.Empty;Di2015NewLine    tryDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        s = typeof(Sign).Assembly.GetManifestResourceStream("Licensing.Private.Private.xml");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Read-in the XML content.Di2015NewLine        StreamReader reader = new StreamReader(s);Di2015NewLine        xmlkey = reader.ReadToEnd();Di2015NewLine        reader.Close();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    catch (Exception e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw new Exception("Error: could not import key:",e);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Create an RSA crypto service provider from the embeddedDi2015NewLine    // XML document resource (the private key).Di2015NewLine    RSACryptoServiceProvider csp = new RSACryptoServiceProvider();Di2015NewLine    csp.FromXmlString(xmlkey);Di2015NewLine    //Creating the XML signing object.Di2015NewLine    SignedXml sxml = new SignedXml(xmldoc);Di2015NewLine    sxml.SigningKey = csp;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //Set the canonicalization method for the document.Di2015NewLine    sxml.SignedInfo.CanonicalizationMethod = SignedXml.XmlDsigCanonicalizationUrl; // No comments.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //Create an empty reference (not enveloped) for the XPath transformation.Di2015NewLine    Reference r = new Reference("");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //Create the XPath transform and add it to the reference list.Di2015NewLine    r.AddTransform(new XmlDsigEnvelopedSignatureTransform(false));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //Add the reference to the SignedXml object.Di2015NewLine    sxml.AddReference(r);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //Compute the signature.Di2015NewLine    sxml.ComputeSignature();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Get the signature XML and add it to the document element.Di2015NewLine    XmlElement sig = sxml.GetXml();Di2015NewLine    xmldoc.DocumentElement.AppendChild(sig);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2549018Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class SignaledQueue<T>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Queue<T> queue = new Queue<T>();Di2015NewLine    volatile bool shutDown = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public bool Enqueue(T item)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (!shutDown)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            lock (queue)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                queue.Enqueue(item);Di2015NewLine                //Pulse only if there can be waiters.Di2015NewLine                if (queue.Count == 1)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    Monitor.PulseAll(queue);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        //Indicate that processing should stop.Di2015NewLine        return false;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public IEnumerable<T> DequeueAll()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        while (!shutDown)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            doDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                T item;Di2015NewLine                lock (queue)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    //If the queue is empty, wait.Di2015NewLine                    if (queue.Count == 0)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        if (shutDown) break;Di2015NewLine                        Monitor.Wait(queue);Di2015NewLine                        if (queue.Count == 0) break;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    item = queue.Dequeue();Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                yield return item;Di2015NewLine            } while (!shutDown);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void SignalShutDown()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        shutDown = true;Di2015NewLine        lock (queue)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //Signal all waiting consumers with PulseAll().Di2015NewLine            Monitor.PulseAll(queue);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
2549018Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int numProducers = 4, numConsumers = 2;Di2015NewLine        SignaledQueue<int> queue = new SignaledQueue<int>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        ParameterizedThreadStart produce = delegate(object obj)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Random rng = new Random((int)obj);Di2015NewLine            int num = 0;Di2015NewLine            while (queue.Enqueue(++num))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Thread.Sleep(rng.Next(100));Di2015NewLine            } Di2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        ThreadStart consume = delegateDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            foreach (int num in queue.DequeueAll())Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Console.Write(" {0}", num);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Random seedRng = new Random();Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < numProducers; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            new Thread(produce).Start(seedRng.Next());Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < numConsumers; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            new Thread(consume).Start();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.ReadKey(true);Di2015NewLine        queue.SignalShutDown();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

customer;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        switch (sortBy)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            case "ID":Di2015NewLine                sortedList = isDescending ? "ContactName":Di2015NewLine                sortedList = isDescending ? sortedList.OrderByDescending(cust => cust.ContactName) : sortedList.OrderBy(cust => cust.ContactName);Di2015NewLine 2556571Di2015UniqueSeparator// Lock the bitmap's bits.  Di2015NewLineRectangle rect = new Rectangle(0, 0, bmp.Width, bmp.Height);Di2015NewLineBitmapData bmpData =bmp.LockBits(rect, ImageLockMode.ReadWrite, bmp.PixelFormat);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Get the address of the first line.Di2015NewLineIntPtr ptr = bmpData.Scan0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Declare an array to hold the bytes of the bitmap.Di2015NewLineint bytes  = bmpData.Stride * bmp.Height;Di2015NewLinebyte[] rgbValues = new byte[bytes];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Copy the RGB values into the array.Di2015NewLineMarshal.Copy(ptr, rgbValues, 0, bytes);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Scanning for non-zero bytesDi2015NewLinebool allBlack = true;Di2015NewLinefor (int index = 0; index < rgbValues.Length; index++)Di2015NewLine    if (rgbValues[index] != 0) Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine       allBlack = false;Di2015NewLine       break;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine// Unlock the bits.Di2015NewLinebmp.UnlockBits(bmpData);Di2015NewLine

2557840Di2015UniqueSeparatorConvert.ToDouble
2557840Di2015UniqueSeparatordouble.Parse

2557840Di2015UniqueSeparator// 2 / 3 = 0 with a remainder of 2; remainder is discardedDi2015NewLinedouble result = 2 / 3;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// 2.0 / 3.0 = 0.6667, as expectedDi2015NewLinedouble result = Convert.ToDouble(2) / Convert.ToDouble(3);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// double.Parse takes a string parameter, so this gives a syntax errorDi2015NewLinedouble result = double.Parse(2) / double.Parse(3);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// As above, double.Parse takes a string, so syntax errorDi2015NewLine// This also does integer arithmetic inside the parentheses, so you would stillDi2015NewLine// have zero as the result anyway.Di2015NewLinedouble result = double.Parse(2 / 3); // gives me errorsDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Here, the integer division 2 / 3 is calculated to be 0 (throw away theDi2015NewLine// remainder), and *then* converted to a double, so you still get zero.Di2015NewLinedouble result = Convert.ToDouble(2 / 3);Di2015NewLine

2558921Di2015UniqueSeparator// instantiate XmlDocument and load XML from fileDi2015NewLineXmlDocument doc = new XmlDocument();Di2015NewLinedoc.Load(@"D:\\test.xml");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// get a list of nodes - in this case, I'm selecting all <AID> nodes underDi2015NewLine// the <GroupAIDs> node - change to suit your needsDi2015NewLineXmlNodeList aNodes = doc.SelectNodes("/Equipment/DataCollections/GroupAIDs/AID");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// loop through all AID nodesDi2015NewLineforeach (XmlNode aNode in aNodes)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine   // grab the "id" attributeDi2015NewLine   XmlAttribute idAttribute = aNode.Attributes["id"];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   // check if that attribute even exists...Di2015NewLine   if (idAttribute != null)Di2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine      // if yes - read its current valueDi2015NewLine      string currentValue = idAttribute.Value;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      // here, you can now decide what to do - for demo purposes,Di2015NewLine      // I just set the ID value to a fixed value if it was empty beforeDi2015NewLine      if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(currentValue))Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine         idAttribute.Value = "515";Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// save the XmlDocument back to diskDi2015NewLinedoc.Save(@"D:\\test2.xml");Di2015NewLine

2561962Di2015UniqueSeparator    private string defaultPdfProg()Di2015NewLine    { //Returns the default program for opening a .pdf file; On Fail returns empty string. Di2015NewLine      // (see notes below) Di2015NewLine        string retval = "";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        RegistryKey pdfDefault = Registry.ClassesRoot.OpenSubKey(".pdf").OpenSubKey("OpenWithList");Di2015NewLine        string[] progs = pdfDefault.GetSubKeyNames();Di2015NewLine        if (progs.Length > 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            retval = progs[1];Di2015NewLine            string[] pieces = retval.Split('.'); // Remove .exeDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (pieces.Length > 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                retval = pieces[0];Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return retval;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void browserIntegration(string defaultPdfProgram)Di2015NewLine    { //Test if browser integration is enabled for Adobe Acrobat (see notes below)Di2015NewLine        RegistryKey reader = null;Di2015NewLine        string[] vers = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (defaultPdfProgram.ToLower() == "acrobat")Di2015NewLine        { //Default program is Adobe AcrobatDi2015NewLine            reader = Registry.LocalMachine.OpenSubKey("Software").OpenSubKey("Adobe").OpenSubKey("Adobe Acrobat");Di2015NewLine            vers = reader.GetSubKeyNames();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else if (defaultPdfProgram.ToLower() == "acrord32")Di2015NewLine        { //Default program is Adobe Acrobat ReaderDi2015NewLine            reader = Registry.LocalMachine.OpenSubKey("Software").OpenSubKey("Adobe").OpenSubKey("Acrobat Reader");Di2015NewLine            vers = reader.GetSubKeyNames();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //TODO: Handle non - adobe .pdf default programDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (vers.Length > 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            string versNum = vers[vers.Length - 1].ToString();Di2015NewLine            reader = reader.OpenSubKey(versNum);Di2015NewLine            reader = reader.OpenSubKey("AdobeViewer",true);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Boolean keyExists = false;Di2015NewLine            Double keyValue = -1;Di2015NewLine            foreach(string adobeViewerValue in reader.GetValueNames())Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (adobeViewerValue.Contains("BrowserIntegration"))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    keyExists = true;Di2015NewLine                    keyValue = Double.Parse(reader.GetValue("BrowserIntegration").ToString());Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (keyExists == false || keyValue < 1)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                string message = "This application requires a setting in Adobe to be changed. Would you like to attempt to change this setting automatically?";Di2015NewLine                DialogResult createKey = MessageBox.Show(message, "Adobe Settings", MessageBoxButtons.OKCancel, MessageBoxIcon.Question, MessageBoxDefaultButton.Button1);Di2015NewLine                if (createKey.ToString() == "OK")Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    reader.SetValue("BrowserIntegration", 1, RegistryValueKind.DWord);Di2015NewLine                    //test to make sure registry value was setDi2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                if (createKey.ToString() == "Cancel")Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    //TODO: Provide instructions to manually change settingDi2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

2562717Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class ExtensionsDi2015NewLine{ Di2015NewLine    public static IQueryable<T> Sort<T>(this IQueryable<T> query, Di2015NewLine                                             string sortField, Di2015NewLine                                             SortDirection direction) Di2015NewLine    { Di2015NewLine        if (direction == SortDirection.Ascending) Di2015NewLine            return query.OrderBy(s => s.GetType()Di2015NewLine                                       .GetProperty(sortField)); Di2015NewLine        return query.OrderByDescending(s => s.GetType()Di2015NewLine                                             .GetProperty(sortField)); Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    } Di2015NewLine} Di2015NewLine

2562717Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IQueryable OrderBy(this IQueryable source, Di2015NewLine                                      string ordering, Di2015NewLine                                      params object[] values) {Di2015NewLine    if (source == null) throw new ArgumentNullException("source");Di2015NewLine    if (ordering == null) throw new ArgumentNullException("ordering");Di2015NewLine    ParameterExpression[] parameters = new ParameterExpression[] {Di2015NewLine        Expression.Parameter(source.ElementType, "") };Di2015NewLine    ExpressionParser parser = new ExpressionParser(parameters, Di2015NewLine                                                   ordering, Di2015NewLine                                                   values);Di2015NewLine    IEnumerable<DynamicOrdering> orderings = parser.ParseOrdering();Di2015NewLine    Expression queryExpr = source.Expression;Di2015NewLine    string methodAsc = "OrderBy";Di2015NewLine    string methodDesc = "OrderByDescending";Di2015NewLine    foreach (DynamicOrdering o in orderings) {Di2015NewLine        queryExpr = Expression.Call(Di2015NewLine            typeof(Queryable), o.Ascending ? methodAsc : methodDesc,Di2015NewLine            new Type[] { source.ElementType, o.Selector.Type },Di2015NewLine            queryExpr, Expression.Quote(Expression.Lambda(o.Selector, Di2015NewLine                                                          parameters)));Di2015NewLine        methodAsc = "ThenBy";Di2015NewLine        methodDesc = "ThenByDescending";Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return source.Provider.CreateQuery(queryExpr);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2563222Di2015UniqueSeparatorread/write
2563222Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic override int Read(byte[] buffer, int offset, int count)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int totalBytesRead = 0;Di2015NewLine    int chunkBytesRead = 0;Di2015NewLine    doDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        chunkBytesRead = _stream.Read(buffer, offset + totalBytesRead, Math.Min(__frameSize, count - totalBytesRead));Di2015NewLine        totalBytesRead += chunkBytesRead;Di2015NewLine    } while (totalBytesRead < count && chunkBytesRead > 0);Di2015NewLine    return totalBytesRead;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override void Write(byte[] buffer, int offset, int count)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int bytesSent = 0;Di2015NewLine        doDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int chunkSize = Math.Min(__frameSize, count - bytesSent);Di2015NewLine            _stream.Write(buffer, offset + bytesSent, chunkSize);Di2015NewLine            bytesSent += chunkSize;Di2015NewLine        } while (bytesSent < count);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//_stream is the wrapped streamDi2015NewLine//__frameSize is a constant, we use 4096 since its easy to allocate.Di2015NewLine

2563809Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Runtime.InteropServices;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// Implements P/Invoke Interop calls to the operating system.Di2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLineinternal static class NativeMethodsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// The type of logon operation to perform.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    internal enum LogonType : intDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// This logon type is intended for users who will be interactivelyDi2015NewLine        /// using the computer, such as a user being logged on by aDi2015NewLine        /// terminal server, remote shell, or similar process.Di2015NewLine        /// This logon type has the additional expense of caching logonDi2015NewLine        /// information for disconnected operations; therefore, it isDi2015NewLine        /// inappropriate for some client/server applications, such as aDi2015NewLine        /// mail server.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        Interactive = 2,Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// This logon type is intended for high performance servers toDi2015NewLine        /// authenticate plaintext passwords.Di2015NewLine        /// The LogonUser function does not cache credentials for thisDi2015NewLine        /// logon type.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        Network = 3,Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// This logon type is intended for batch servers, where processesDi2015NewLine        /// may be executing on behalf of a user without their directDi2015NewLine        /// intervention.  This type is also for higher performance serversDi2015NewLine        /// that process many plaintext authentication attempts at a time,Di2015NewLine        /// such as mail or Web servers.Di2015NewLine        /// The LogonUser function does not cache credentials for thisDi2015NewLine        /// logon type.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        Batch = 4,Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Indicates a service-type logon.  The account provided must haveDi2015NewLine        /// the service privilege enabled.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        Service = 5,Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// This logon type is for GINA DLLs that log on users who will beDi2015NewLine        /// interactively using the computer.Di2015NewLine        /// This logon type can generate a unique audit record that showsDi2015NewLine        /// when the workstation was unlocked.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        Unlock = 7,Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// This logon type preserves the name and password in theDi2015NewLine        /// authentication package, which allows the server to makeDi2015NewLine        /// connections to other network servers while impersonating theDi2015NewLine        /// client.  A server can accept plaintext credentials from aDi2015NewLine        /// client, call LogonUser, verify that the user can access theDi2015NewLine        /// system across the network, and still communicate with otherDi2015NewLine        /// servers.Di2015NewLine        /// NOTE: Windows NT:  This value is not supported.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        NetworkCleartext = 8,Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// This logon type allows the caller to clone its current tokenDi2015NewLine        /// and specify new credentials for outbound connections.  The newDi2015NewLine        /// logon session has the same local identifier but uses differentDi2015NewLine        /// credentials for other network connections.Di2015NewLine        /// NOTE: This logon type is supported only by theDi2015NewLine        /// LOGON32_PROVIDER_WINNT50 logon provider.Di2015NewLine        /// NOTE: Windows NT:  This value is not supported.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        NewCredentials = 9Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Specifies the logon provider.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    internal enum LogonProvider : intDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Use the standard logon provider for the system.Di2015NewLine        /// The default security provider is negotiate, unless you passDi2015NewLine        /// NULL for the domain name and the user name is not in UPN format.Di2015NewLine        /// In this case, the default provider is NTLM.Di2015NewLine        /// NOTE: Windows 2000/NT:   The default security provider is NTLM.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        Default = 0,Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Use this provider if you'll be authenticating against a WindowsDi2015NewLine        /// NT 3.51 domain controller (uses the NT 3.51 logon provider).Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        WinNT35 = 1,Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Use the NTLM logon provider.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        WinNT40 = 2,Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Use the negotiate logon provider.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        WinNT50 = 3Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// The type of logon operation to perform.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    internal enum SecurityImpersonationLevel : intDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// The server process cannot obtain identification informationDi2015NewLine        /// about the client, and it cannot impersonate the client.  It isDi2015NewLine        /// defined with no value given, and thus, by ANSI C rules,Di2015NewLine        /// defaults to a value of zero.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        Anonymous = 0,Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// The server process can obtain information about the client,Di2015NewLine        /// such as security identifiers and privileges, but it cannotDi2015NewLine        /// impersonate the client.  This is useful for servers that exportDi2015NewLine        /// their own objects, for example, database products that exportDi2015NewLine        /// tables and views.  Using the retrieved client-securityDi2015NewLine        /// information, the server can make access-validation decisionsDi2015NewLine        /// without being able to use other services that are using theDi2015NewLine        /// client's security context.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        Identification = 1,Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// The server process can impersonate the client's securityDi2015NewLine        /// context on its local system.  The server cannot impersonate theDi2015NewLine        /// client on remote systems.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        Impersonation = 2,Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// The server process can impersonate the client's securityDi2015NewLine        /// context on remote systems.Di2015NewLine        /// NOTE: Windows NT:  This impersonation level is not supported.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        Delegation = 3Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Logs on the name="password">The password.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="logonType">Type of the logon.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="logonProvider">The logon provider.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="token">The token.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns>True if the function succeeds, false if the function fails.Di2015NewLine    /// To get extended error information, call 2565861Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic byte[] Encrypt(byte[] plaintext)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (plaintext == null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentNullException("plaintext");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    byte[] ciphertext = new byte[plaintext.Length];Di2015NewLine    int c = 0;Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < plaintext.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        c = _encryptionTable[plaintext[i] ^ c];Di2015NewLine        ciphertext[i] = (byte)c;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return ciphertext;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2566723Di2015UniqueSeparatorstring unicodeString = "\\u0432\\u043b\\u0430\\u0434\\u043e\\u043c";Di2015NewLine
2566723Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic void Main()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string unicodeString = "\\u0432\\u043b\\u0430\\u0434\\u043e\\u043c <b>\\u043f\\u0443\\u0442\\u0438\\u043c<\\b> \\u043d\\u0430\\u0447";Di2015NewLine        // Create two different encodings.Di2015NewLine        Encoding utf8 = Encoding.UTF8;Di2015NewLine        Encoding unicode = Encoding.Unicode;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Convert the string into a byte[].Di2015NewLine        byte[] unicodeBytes = unicode.GetBytes(unicodeString);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Perform the conversion from one encoding to the other.Di2015NewLine        byte[] utf8Bytes = Encoding.Convert(unicode, utf8, unicodeBytes);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Convert the new byte[] into a char[] and then into a string.Di2015NewLine        // This is a slightly different approach to converting to illustrateDi2015NewLine        // the use of GetCharCount/GetChars.Di2015NewLine        char[] asciiChars = new char[utf8.GetCharCount(utf8Bytes, 0, utf8Bytes.Length)];Di2015NewLine        utf8.GetChars(utf8Bytes, 0, utf8Bytes.Length, asciiChars, 0);Di2015NewLine        string asciiString = new string(asciiChars);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Display the strings created before and after the conversion.Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Original string: {0}", unicodeString);Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Ascii converted string: {0}", asciiString);Di2015NewLine        Console.ReadKey();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

2567623Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static int Count1(string s)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int len = s.Length;Di2015NewLine    int c = 0;Di2015NewLine    for (int i=0; i < len;  i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (s[i] == '\\n') c++;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return c+1;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static int Count2(string s)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int count = -1;Di2015NewLine    int index = -1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    doDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        count++;Di2015NewLine        index = s.IndexOf('\\n', index + 1);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    while (index != -1);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return count+1;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static int Count3(string s)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return s.Count( c => c == '\\n' ) + 1;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static int Count4(string s)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int n = 0;Di2015NewLine    foreach( var c in s )Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if ( c == '\\n' ) n++;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return n+1;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static int Count5(string s)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var a = s.ToCharArray();Di2015NewLine    int c = 0;Di2015NewLine    for (int i=0; i < a.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (a[i]=='\\n') c++;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return c+1;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2572399Di2015UniqueSeparatorISessionFactory.GetCurrentSession()
2572399Di2015UniqueSeparator    public ISession GetContextSession()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var factory = GetFactory(); // GetFactory returns an ISessionFactory in my helper classDi2015NewLine        ISession session;Di2015NewLine        if (CurrentSessionContext.HasBind(factory))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            session = factory.GetCurrentSession();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            session = factory.OpenSession();Di2015NewLine            CurrentSessionContext.Bind(session);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return session;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void EndContextSession()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var factory = GetFactory();Di2015NewLine        var session = CurrentSessionContext.Unbind(factory);Di2015NewLine        if (session != null && session.IsOpen)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (session.Transaction != null && session.Transaction.IsActive)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    session.Transaction.Rollback();Di2015NewLine                    throw new Exception("Rolling back uncommited NHibernate transaction.");Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                session.Flush();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                log.Error("SessionKey.EndContextSession", ex);Di2015NewLine                throw;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            finallyDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                session.Close();Di2015NewLine                session.Dispose();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }        Di2015NewLine

2572667Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq.Expressions;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace LinqResearchDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public class ProgramDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        [STAThread]Di2015NewLine        static void Main()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            string columnToGroupBy = "Size";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // generate the dynamic Expression<Func<Product, string>>Di2015NewLine            ParameterExpression p = Expression.Parameter(typeof(Product), "p");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var selector = Expression.Lambda<Func<Product, string>>(Di2015NewLine                Expression.Property(p, columnToGroupBy),Di2015NewLine                pDi2015NewLine            );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            using (LinqDataContext dataContext = new LinqDataContext())Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                /* using "selector" caluclated above which is automatically Di2015NewLine                compiled when the query runs */Di2015NewLine                var results = dataContextDi2015NewLine                    .ProductsDi2015NewLine                    .GroupBy(selector)Di2015NewLine                    .Select((group) => new { Di2015NewLine                        Key = group.Key, Di2015NewLine                        Count = group.Count()Di2015NewLine                    });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                foreach(var result in results)Di2015NewLine                    Console.WriteLine("{0}: {1}", result.Key, result.Count);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Console.ReadKey();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2572919Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate Func<Pool<T>, T> factory;Di2015NewLine
2572919Di2015UniqueSeparatornew()
2572919Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class Pool<T> : IDisposableDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Other code - we'll come back to thisDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    interface IItemStoreDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        T Fetch();Di2015NewLine        void Store(T item);Di2015NewLine        int Count { get; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
2572919Di2015UniqueSeparatorPool
2572919Di2015UniqueSeparatorList<T>
2572919Di2015UniqueSeparatorPool<T>
2572919Di2015UniqueSeparatorPool
2572919Di2015UniqueSeparator    class QueueStore : Queue<T>, IItemStoreDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public QueueStore(int capacity) : base(capacity)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public T Fetch()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return Dequeue();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public void Store(T item)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Enqueue(item);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    class StackStore : Stack<T>, IItemStoreDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public StackStore(int capacity) : base(capacity)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public T Fetch()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return Pop();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public void Store(T item)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Push(item);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
2572919Di2015UniqueSeparator    class CircularStore : IItemStoreDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        private List<Slot> slots;Di2015NewLine        private int freeSlotCount;Di2015NewLine        private int position = -1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public CircularStore(int capacity)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            slots = new List<Slot>(capacity);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public T Fetch()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (Count == 0)Di2015NewLine                throw new InvalidOperationException("The buffer is empty.");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            int startPosition = position;Di2015NewLine            doDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Advance();Di2015NewLine                Slot slot = slots[position];Di2015NewLine                if (!slot.IsInUse)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    slot.IsInUse = true;Di2015NewLine                    --freeSlotCount;Di2015NewLine                    return slot.Item;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            } while (startPosition != position);Di2015NewLine            throw new InvalidOperationException("No free slots.");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public void Store(T item)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Slot slot = slots.Find(s => object.Equals(s.Item, item));Di2015NewLine            if (slot == null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                slot = new Slot(item);Di2015NewLine                slots.Add(slot);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            slot.IsInUse = false;Di2015NewLine            ++freeSlotCount;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public int CountDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            get { return freeSlotCount; }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private void Advance()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            position = (position + 1) % slots.Count;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        class SlotDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            public Slot(T item)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                this.Item = item;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            public T Item { get; private set; }Di2015NewLine            public bool IsInUse { get; set; }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
2572919Di2015UniqueSeparator// Outside the poolDi2015NewLinepublic enum AccessMode { FIFO, LIFO, Circular };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private IItemStore itemStore;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Inside the PoolDi2015NewLine    private IItemStore CreateItemStore(AccessMode mode, int capacity)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        switch (mode)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            case AccessMode.FIFO:Di2015NewLine                return new QueueStore(capacity);Di2015NewLine            case AccessMode.LIFO:Di2015NewLine                return new StackStore(capacity);Di2015NewLine            default:Di2015NewLine                Debug.Assert(mode == AccessMode.Circular,Di2015NewLine                    "Invalid AccessMode in CreateItemStore");Di2015NewLine                return new CircularStore(capacity);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
2572919Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic enum LoadingMode { Eager, Lazy, LazyExpanding };Di2015NewLine
2572919Di2015UniqueSeparator    private int size;Di2015NewLine    private int count;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private T AcquireEager()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        lock (itemStore)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return itemStore.Fetch();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private T AcquireLazy()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        lock (itemStore)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (itemStore.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return itemStore.Fetch();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        Interlocked.Increment(ref count);Di2015NewLine        return factory(this);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private T AcquireLazyExpanding()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        bool shouldExpand = false;Di2015NewLine        if (count < size)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int newCount = Interlocked.Increment(ref count);Di2015NewLine            if (newCount <= size)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                shouldExpand = true;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Another thread took the last spot - use the store insteadDi2015NewLine                Interlocked.Decrement(ref count);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if (shouldExpand)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return factory(this);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            lock (itemStore)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return itemStore.Fetch();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void PreloadItems()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < size; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            T item = factory(this);Di2015NewLine            itemStore.Store(item);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        count = size;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
2572919Di2015UniqueSeparatorsize
2572919Di2015UniqueSeparatorcount
2572919Di2015UniqueSeparatorAcquireEager
2572919Di2015UniqueSeparatorPreloadItems
2572919Di2015UniqueSeparatorAcquireLazy
2572919Di2015UniqueSeparatorAcquireLazyExpanding
2572919Di2015UniqueSeparator    private bool isDisposed;Di2015NewLine    private Func<Pool<T>, T> factory;Di2015NewLine    private LoadingMode loadingMode;Di2015NewLine    private IItemStore itemStore;Di2015NewLine    private int size;Di2015NewLine    private int count;Di2015NewLine    private Semaphore sync;Di2015NewLine
2572919Di2015UniqueSeparator    public Pool(int size, Func<Pool<T>, T> factory,Di2015NewLine        LoadingMode loadingMode, AccessMode accessMode)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (size <= 0)Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException("size", size,Di2015NewLine                "Argument 'size' must be greater than zero.");Di2015NewLine        if (factory == null)Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentNullException("factory");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        this.size = size;Di2015NewLine        this.factory = factory;Di2015NewLine        sync = new Semaphore(size, size);Di2015NewLine        this.loadingMode = loadingMode;Di2015NewLine        this.itemStore = CreateItemStore(accessMode, size);Di2015NewLine        if (loadingMode == LoadingMode.Eager)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            PreloadItems();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
2572919Di2015UniqueSeparatorPreloadItems
2572919Di2015UniqueSeparatorAcquire
2572919Di2015UniqueSeparatorRelease
2572919Di2015UniqueSeparator    public T Acquire()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        sync.WaitOne();Di2015NewLine        switch (loadingMode)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            case LoadingMode.Eager:Di2015NewLine                return AcquireEager();Di2015NewLine            case LoadingMode.Lazy:Di2015NewLine                return AcquireLazy();Di2015NewLine            default:Di2015NewLine                Debug.Assert(loadingMode == LoadingMode.LazyExpanding,Di2015NewLine                    "Unknown LoadingMode encountered in Acquire method.");Di2015NewLine                return AcquireLazyExpanding();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Release(T item)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        lock (itemStore)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            itemStore.Store(item);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        sync.Release();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
2572919Di2015UniqueSeparatorSemaphore
2572919Di2015UniqueSeparator    public void Dispose()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (isDisposed)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        isDisposed = true;Di2015NewLine        if (typeof(IDisposable).IsAssignableFrom(typeof(T)))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            lock (itemStore)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                while (itemStore.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    IDisposable disposable = (IDisposable)itemStore.Fetch();Di2015NewLine                    disposable.Dispose();Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        sync.Close();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public bool IsDisposedDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return isDisposed; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

2574798Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System.Drawing.Imaging;Di2015NewLineusing System.Runtime.InteropServices;Di2015NewLine...Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static Bitmap BitmapTo1Bpp(Bitmap img) {Di2015NewLine  int w = img.Width;Di2015NewLine  int h = img.Height;Di2015NewLine  Bitmap bmp = new Bitmap(w, h, PixelFormat.Format1bppIndexed);Di2015NewLine  BitmapData data = bmp.LockBits(new Rectangle(0, 0, w, h), ImageLockMode.ReadWrite, PixelFormat.Format1bppIndexed);Di2015NewLine  byte[] scan = new byte[(w + 7) / 8];Di2015NewLine  for (int y = 0; y < h; y++) {Di2015NewLine    for (int x = 0; x < w; x++) {Di2015NewLine      if (x % 8 == 0) scan[x / 8] = 0;Di2015NewLine      Color c = img.GetPixel(x, y);Di2015NewLine      if (c.GetBrightness() >= 0.5) scan[x / 8] |= (byte)(0x80 >> (x % 8));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    Marshal.Copy(scan, 0, (IntPtr)((long)data.Scan0 + data.Stride * y), scan.Length);Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine  bmp.UnlockBits(data);Di2015NewLine  return bmp;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2575070Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void textBox1_TextChanged(object sender, TextChangedEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    foreach (var change in e.Changes)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (change.AddedLength > 0 && change.RemovedLength == 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (change.AddedLength == 1)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                AddCharacter(textBox1.Text[change.Offset], change.Offset);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                AddString(textBox1.Text.Substring(change.Offset, change.AddedLength), change.Offset);  Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else if (change.AddedLength == 0 && change.RemovedLength > 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (change.RemovedLength == 1)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                RemoveCharacter(change.Offset);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                RemoveString(change.Offset, change.RemovedLength + change.Offset);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else if (change.AddedLength == 1 & change.RemovedLength == 1)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            ReplaceCharacter(change.Offset, textBox1.Text[change.Offset]);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            ReplaceString(change.Offset, change.Offset + change.RemovedLength, textBox1.Text.Substring(change.Offset, change.AddedLength));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2575496Di2015UniqueSeparatorGetHashCode()

nullDi2015NewLine            && ShouldScrollDown(e.Location))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                //Di2015NewLine                // enable the timer to scroll the screenDi2015NewLine                //Di2015NewLine                scrollTimer = new System.Threading.Timer(new System.Threading.TimerCallback(TimerScroll), 1, 0, 250);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            if (scrollTimer == nullDi2015NewLine            && ShouldScrollUp(e.Location))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                scrollTimer = new System.Threading.Timer(new <= this.Bounds.Width;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    bool ShouldScrollDown(Point location)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return location.Y > this.Bounds.Height - 15Di2015NewLine            && location.Y < this.Bounds.HeightDi2015NewLine            && location.X >= 0Di2015NewLine            && location.X <= this.Bounds.Width;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    void StopAutoScrolling()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (scrollTimer != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //Di2015NewLine            // disable the timer to scroll the screenDi2015NewLine            // Di2015NewLine            scrollTimer.Change(System.Threading.Timeout.Infinite, System.Threading.Timeout.Infinite);Di2015NewLine            scrollTimer = null;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    void TimerScroll(object state)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        SetScrollBar((int)state);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    bool scrolling = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    void SetScrollBar(int direction)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (scrolling)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if (this.InvokeRequired)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            this.Invoke(new Action<int>(SetScrollBar), new object[] {direction});Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            scrolling = true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (0 < direction)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (this.FirstDisplayedScrollingRowIndex < this.Rows.Count - 1)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine 2579755Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic string GetCSharpRepresentation( Type t, bool trimArgCount ) {Di2015NewLine    if( t.IsGenericType ) {Di2015NewLine        var genericArgs = t.GetGenericArguments().ToList();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return GetCSharpRepresentation( t, trimArgCount, genericArgs );Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return t.Name;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestatic string GetCSharpRepresentation( Type t, bool trimArgCount, List<Type> availableArguments ) {Di2015NewLine    if( t.IsGenericType ) {Di2015NewLine        string value = t.Name;Di2015NewLine        if( trimArgCount && value.IndexOf("`") > -1 ) {Di2015NewLine            value = value.Substring( 0, value.IndexOf( "`" ) );Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if( t.DeclaringType != null ) {Di2015NewLine            // This is a nested type, build the nesting type firstDi2015NewLine            value = GetCSharpRepresentation( t.DeclaringType, trimArgCount, availableArguments ) + "+" + value;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Build the type arguments (if any)Di2015NewLine        string argString = "";Di2015NewLine        var thisTypeArgs = t.GetGenericArguments();Di2015NewLine        for( int i = 0; i < thisTypeArgs.Length && availableArguments.Count > 0; i++ ) {Di2015NewLine            if( i != 0 ) argString += ", ";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            argString += GetCSharpRepresentation( availableArguments[0], trimArgCount );Di2015NewLine            availableArguments.RemoveAt( 0 );Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // If there are type arguments, add them with < >Di2015NewLine        if( argString.Length > 0 ) {Di2015NewLine            value += "<" + argString + ">";Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return value;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return t.Name;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2582050Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic interface ILock : IDisposableDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class ThreadGuardDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private static readonly object SlotMarker = new Object();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    [ThreadStatic]Di2015NewLine    private static Dictionary<Guid, object> locks;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private Guid lockID;Di2015NewLine    private object sync = new Object();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void BeginGuardedOperation()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        lock (sync)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (lockID == Guid.Empty)Di2015NewLine                throw new InvalidOperationException("Guarded operation " +Di2015NewLine                    "was blocked because no lock has been obtained.");Di2015NewLine            object currentLock;Di2015NewLine            Locks.TryGetValue(lockID, out currentLock);Di2015NewLine            if (currentLock != SlotMarker)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                throw new InvalidOperationException("Guarded operation " +Di2015NewLine                    "was blocked because the lock was obtained on a " +Di2015NewLine                    "different thread from the calling thread.");Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public ILock GetLock()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        lock (sync)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (lockID != Guid.Empty)Di2015NewLine                throw new InvalidOperationException("This instance is " +Di2015NewLine                    "already locked.");Di2015NewLine            lockID = Guid.NewGuid();Di2015NewLine            Locks.Add(lockID, SlotMarker);Di2015NewLine            return new ThreadGuardLock(this);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void ReleaseLock()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        lock (sync)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (lockID == Guid.Empty)Di2015NewLine                throw new InvalidOperationException("This instance cannot " +Di2015NewLine                    "be unlocked because no lock currently exists.");Di2015NewLine            object currentLock;Di2015NewLine            Locks.TryGetValue(lockID, out currentLock);Di2015NewLine            if (currentLock == SlotMarker)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Locks.Remove(lockID);Di2015NewLine                lockID = Guid.Empty;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine                throw new InvalidOperationException("Unlock must be invoked " +Di2015NewLine                    "from same thread that invoked Lock.");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public bool IsLockedDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        getDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            lock (sync)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return (lockID != Guid.Empty);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected static Dictionary<Guid, object> LocksDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        getDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (locks == null)Di2015NewLine                locks = new Dictionary<Guid, object>();Di2015NewLine            return locks;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #region Lock ImplementationDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    class ThreadGuardLock : ILockDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        private ThreadGuard guard;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public ThreadGuardLock(ThreadGuard guard)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            this.guard = guard;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public void Dispose()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            guard.ReleaseLock();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #endregionDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2583079Di2015UniqueSeparatorDispatcher
2583079Di2015UniqueSeparator// (c) Copyright Microsoft Corporation.Di2015NewLine// This source is subject to the Microsoft Public License (Ms-PL).Di2015NewLine// Please see http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=131993 for details.Di2015NewLine// All other rights reserved.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineusing System.ComponentModel;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace System.Windows.ThreadingDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// A smart dispatcher system for routing actions to the user interfaceDi2015NewLine    /// thread.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public static class SmartDispatcherDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// A single Dispatcher instance to marshall actions to the userDi2015NewLine        /// interface thread.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        private static Dispatcher _instance;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Backing field for a value indicating whether this is a design-timeDi2015NewLine        /// environment.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        private static bool? _designer;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Requires an instance and attempts to find a Dispatcher if one hasDi2015NewLine        /// not yet been set.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        private static void RequireInstance()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (_designer == null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                _designer = DesignerProperties.IsInDesignTool;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Design-time is more of a no-op, won't be able to resolve theDi2015NewLine            // dispatcher if it isn't already set in these situations.Di2015NewLine            if (_designer == true)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Attempt to use the RootVisual of the plugin to retrieve aDi2015NewLine            // dispatcher instance. This call will only succeed if the currentDi2015NewLine            // thread is the UI thread.Di2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                _instance = Application.Current.RootVisual.Dispatcher;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            catch (Exception e)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                throw new InvalidOperationException("The first time SmartDispatcher is used must be from a user interface thread. Consider having the application call Initialize, with or without an instance.", e);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (_instance == null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                throw new InvalidOperationException("Unable to find a suitable Dispatcher instance.");Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Initializes the SmartDispatcher system, attempting to use theDi2015NewLine        /// RootVisual of the plugin to retrieve a Dispatcher instance.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        public static void Initialize()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (_instance == null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                RequireInstance();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Initializes the SmartDispatcher system with the dispatcherDi2015NewLine        /// instance.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="dispatcher">The dispatcher instance.</param>Di2015NewLine        public static void Initialize(Dispatcher dispatcher)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (dispatcher == null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                throw new ArgumentNullException("dispatcher");Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            _instance = dispatcher;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (_designer == null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                _designer = DesignerProperties.IsInDesignTool;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <returns></returns>Di2015NewLine        public static bool CheckAccess()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (_instance == null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                RequireInstance();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return _instance.CheckAccess();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Executes the specified delegate asynchronously on the user interfaceDi2015NewLine        /// thread. If the current thread is the user interface thread, theDi2015NewLine        /// dispatcher if not used and the operation happens immediately.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="a">A delegate to a method that takes no arguments and Di2015NewLine        /// does not return a value, which is either pushed onto the Dispatcher Di2015NewLine        /// event queue or immediately run, depending on the current thread.</param>Di2015NewLine        public static void BeginInvoke(Action a)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (_instance == null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                RequireInstance();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // If the current thread is the user interface thread, skip theDi2015NewLine            // dispatcher and directly invoke the Action.Di2015NewLine            if (_instance.CheckAccess() || _designer == true)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                a();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                _instance.BeginInvoke(a);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2585122Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic int Compare(ListViewItem x, ListViewItem y)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem itemOne = x.SubItems[subItemIndex];Di2015NewLine    ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem itemTwo = y.SubItems[subItemIndex];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // if they're both empty, return 0Di2015NewLine    if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(itemOne.Text) && string.IsNullOrEmpty(itemTwo.Text))Di2015NewLine        return 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // if itemOne is empty, it comes secondDi2015NewLine    if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(itemOne.Text))Di2015NewLine        return 1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // if itemTwo is empty, it comes secondDi2015NewLine    if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(itemTwo.Text)Di2015NewLine        return -1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    uint itemOneComparison = uint.Parse(itemOne.Text);Di2015NewLine    uint itemTwoComparison = uint.Parse(itemTwo.Text);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Calculate correct return value based on object comparison.Di2015NewLine    int comparison = itemOneComparison.CompareTo(itemTwoComparison);Di2015NewLine    if (OrderOfSort == SortOrder.Descending)Di2015NewLine        comparison = (-comparison);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return comparison;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public override bool CanRead { get { return true; } }Di2015NewLine  public override bool CanSeek { get { return true; } }Di2015NewLine  public override bool CanWrite { get { return true; }Di2015NewLine    set { throw new NotImplementedException(); }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public override int Read(byte[] buffer, int offset, int count) {Di2015NewLine    if (offset != 0) throw new NotImplementedException();Di2015NewLine    mSource.Read(buffer, count, mInt64);Di2015NewLine    return iop.Marshal.ReadInt32(mInt64);Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public override long Seek(long offset, System.IO.SeekOrigin origin) {Di2015NewLine    mSource.Seek(offset, (int)origin, mInt64);Di2015NewLine    return iop.Marshal.ReadInt64(mInt64);Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public override void SetLength(long value) {Di2015NewLine    mSource.SetSize(value);Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public override void Write(byte[] buffer, int offset, int count) {Di2015NewLine    if (offset != 0) throw new NotImplementedException();Di2015NewLine    mSource.Write(buffer, count, IntPtr.Zero);Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2588730Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate class BrutePasswordGuesserDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private const int MaxAscii = 126;Di2015NewLine    private const int MaxSize = 3;Di2015NewLine    private const int MinAscii = 33;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private int _currentLength;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public BrutePasswordGuesser()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //Init the length, and current guess array.Di2015NewLine        _currentLength = 0;Di2015NewLine        CurrentGuess = new char[MaxSize];Di2015NewLine        CurrentGuess[0] = (char) MinAscii;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public char[] CurrentGuess { get; private set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public bool NextGuess()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (_currentLength >= MaxSize)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Increment the previous digit (Uses recursion!)Di2015NewLine        IncrementDigit(_currentLength);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return true;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Increment the character at the index by one. If the character is at the maximum Di2015NewLine    /// ASCII value, set it back to the minimum, and increment the previous character.Di2015NewLine    /// Use recursion to do this, so that the proggy will step all the way back as needed.Di2015NewLine    /// If the very bottom of the string is reached, add another character to the guess.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="digitIndex"></param>Di2015NewLine    private void IncrementDigit(int digitIndex)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //Don't fall out the bottom of the array.Di2015NewLine        //If we're at the bottom of the array, add another characterDi2015NewLine        if (digitIndex < 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            AddCharacter();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //If the current character is max ASCII, set to min ASCII, and increment the previous char.Di2015NewLine            if (CurrentGuess[digitIndex] == (char) MaxAscii)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                CurrentGuess[digitIndex] = (char) MinAscii;Di2015NewLine                IncrementDigit(digitIndex - 1);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                CurrentGuess[digitIndex]++;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void AddCharacter()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _currentLength++;Di2015NewLine        //If we've reached our maximum guess size, leave now and don't come back.Di2015NewLine        if (_currentLength >= MaxSize)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        //Initialis as min ASCII.Di2015NewLine        CurrentGuess[_currentLength] = (char) (MinAscii);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
2588730Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void button1_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var guesser = new BrutePasswordGuesser();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var guess = new String(guesser.CurrentGuess);Di2015NewLine    while (textBox1.Text != guess)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        textBox2.Text = guess;Di2015NewLine        if (!guesser.NextGuess())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            label1.Text = "Maximum guess size reached.";Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        guess = new String(guesser.CurrentGuess);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (textBox1.Text == textBox2.Text)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Label1.Text = "Password Correct";Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

"+" + value.ToString("N") : value.ToString("N");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public override string ToString() {Di2015NewLine      return WithSign(mReal) + "i" + WithSign(mImaginary);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine

2591284Di2015UniqueSeparator// Boolean flag used to determine when a character other than a number is entered.Di2015NewLineprivate bool nonNumberEntered = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Handle the KeyDown event to determine the type of character entered into the control.Di2015NewLineprivate void textBox1_KeyDown(object sender, System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Initialize the flag to false.Di2015NewLine    nonNumberEntered = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Determine whether the keystroke is a number from the top of the keyboard.Di2015NewLine    if (e.KeyCode < Keys.D0 || e.KeyCode > Keys.D9)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Determine whether the keystroke is a number from the keypad.Di2015NewLine        if (e.KeyCode < Keys.NumPad0 || e.KeyCode > Keys.NumPad9)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Determine whether the keystroke is a backspace.Di2015NewLine            if(e.KeyCode != Keys.Back)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // A non-numerical keystroke was pressed.Di2015NewLine                // Set the flag to true and evaluate in KeyPress event.Di2015NewLine                nonNumberEntered = true;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    //If shift key was pressed, it's not a number.Di2015NewLine    if (Control.ModifierKeys == Keys.Shift) {Di2015NewLine        nonNumberEntered = true;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// This event occurs after the KeyDown event and can be used to preventDi2015NewLine// characters from entering the control.Di2015NewLineprivate void textBox1_KeyPress(object sender, System.Windows.Forms.KeyPressEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Check for the flag being set in the KeyDown event.Di2015NewLine    if (nonNumberEntered == true)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Stop the character from being entered into the control since it is non-numerical.Di2015NewLine        e.Handled = true;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2599354Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic StringBuilder GetLogMessage(LogEventType logType, object message)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return GetLogMessage(logType, message, null);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic StringBuilder GetLogMessage(LogEventType logType, object message, Dictionary<string,string> extraParameters) Di2015NewLine{ Di2015NewLine        StringBuilder logEntry = new StringBuilder(); Di2015NewLine        logEntry.AppendFormat("DATE={0} ", DateTime.Now.ToString("dd-MMM-yyyy", new CultureInfo(CommonConfig.EnglishCultureCode))); Di2015NewLine        logEntry.AppendFormat("TIME={0} ", DateTime.Now.ToString("HH:mm:ss", new CultureInfo(CommonConfig.EnglishCultureCode))); Di2015NewLine        logEntry.AppendFormat("ERRORNO={0} ", base.RemoteIPAddress.ToString().Replace(".", string.Empty)); Di2015NewLine        logEntry.AppendFormat("IP={0}", base.RemoteIPAddress.ToString()); Di2015NewLine        logEntry.AppendFormat("LANG={0} ", base.Culture.TwoLetterISOLanguageName); Di2015NewLine        logEntry.AppendFormat("PNR={0} ", this.RecordLocator); Di2015NewLine        logEntry.AppendFormat("AGENT={0} ", base.UserAgent); Di2015NewLine        logEntry.AppendFormat("REF={0} ", base.Referrer); Di2015NewLine        logEntry.AppendFormat("SID={0} ", base.CurrentContext.Session.SessionID); Di2015NewLine        logEntry.AppendFormat("LOGTYPE={0} ", logType.ToString() ); Di2015NewLine        if(extraParameters != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine             foreach(var s in extraParameters.Keys)Di2015NewLine             {Di2015NewLine                  logEntry.AppendFormat("{0}={1} ", s, extraParameters[s] ); Di2015NewLine             }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        logEntry.AppendFormat("MESSAGE={0} ", message); Di2015NewLine        return logEntry; Di2015NewLine} Di2015NewLine

2599491Di2015UniqueSeparator    [Test]Di2015NewLine    public void CanSerializeCompany()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var model = TypeModel.Create();Di2015NewLine        model.Add(typeof(Company), false).Add("Employees");Di2015NewLine        model.Add(typeof(Employee), false).Add("EmployeeName", "Designation");Di2015NewLine        model.CompileInPlace();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Company comp = new Company {Di2015NewLine            Employees = {Di2015NewLine                new Employee { Designation = "Boss", EmployeeName = "Fred"},Di2015NewLine                new Employee { Designation = "Grunt", EmployeeName = "Jo"},Di2015NewLine                new Employee { Designation = "Scapegoat", EmployeeName = "Alex"}}Di2015NewLine        }, clone;Di2015NewLine        using(var ms = new MemoryStream()) {Di2015NewLine            model.Serialize(ms, comp);Di2015NewLine            ms.Position = 0;Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Bytes: " + ms.Length);Di2015NewLine            clone = (Company) model.Deserialize(ms, null, typeof(Company));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        Assert.AreEqual(3, clone.Employees.Count);Di2015NewLine        Assert.AreEqual("Boss", clone.Employees[0].Designation);Di2015NewLine        Assert.AreEqual("Alex", clone.Employees[2].EmployeeName);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

2602302Di2015UniqueSeparator;; Reforms a single-line string ARG to a multi-line string with a maxDi2015NewLine;; of LIMIT chars on a line.Di2015NewLine;;Di2015NewLine;; This is intended to solve a problem with the display of tooltip textDi2015NewLine;; in emacs on Win32 - which is that the tooltip is extended to be very veryDi2015NewLine;; long, and the final line is clipped.Di2015NewLine;;Di2015NewLine;; The solution is to split the text into multiple lines, and to add aDi2015NewLine;; trailing newline to trick the tooltip logic into doing the right thing.Di2015NewLine;;Di2015NewLine(defun cheeso-reform-string (limit arg)Di2015NewLine  (let ((orig arg) (modified "") (curline "") wordDi2015NewLine        (words (split-string arg " ")))Di2015NewLine    (while wordsDi2015NewLine      (prognDi2015NewLine        (setq curline "")Di2015NewLine        (while (and words (< (length curline) limit))Di2015NewLine          (prognDi2015NewLine            (setq word (car words))Di2015NewLine            (setq words (cdr words))Di2015NewLine            (setq curline (concat curline " " word))))Di2015NewLine        (setq modified (concat modified curline "\\n"))))Di2015NewLine    (setq modified (concat modified " \\n")))Di2015NewLine  )Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine(defadvice tooltip-show (beforeDi2015NewLine                         flymake-csharp-fixup-tooltipDi2015NewLine                         (arg &optional use-echo-area)Di2015NewLine                         activate compile)Di2015NewLine  (prognDi2015NewLine    (if (and (not use-echo-area)Di2015NewLine             (eq major-mode 'csharp-mode))Di2015NewLine        (let ((orig (ad-get-arg 0)))Di2015NewLine          (ad-set-arg 0 (cheeso-reform-string 72 orig))Di2015NewLine          ))))Di2015NewLine

2611642Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class Form1 : FormDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private Bitmap buffer;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Form1()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        InitializeComponent();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Initialize bufferDi2015NewLine        panel1_Resize(this, null);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void panel1_Resize(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Resize the buffer, if it is growingDi2015NewLine        if (buffer == null || Di2015NewLine            buffer.Width < panel1.Width || Di2015NewLine            buffer.Height < panel1.Height)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Bitmap newBuffer = new Bitmap(panel1.Width, panel1.Height);Di2015NewLine            if (buffer != null)Di2015NewLine                using (Graphics bufferGrph = Graphics.FromImage(newBuffer))Di2015NewLine                    bufferGrph.DrawImageUnscaled(buffer, Point.Empty);Di2015NewLine            buffer = newBuffer;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void panel1_Paint(object sender, PaintEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Draw the buffer into the panelDi2015NewLine        e.Graphics.DrawImageUnscaled(buffer, Point.Empty);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void button1_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Draw into the buffer when button is clickedDi2015NewLine        PaintBlueRectangle();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void PaintBlueRectangle()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Draw blue rectangle into the bufferDi2015NewLine        using (Graphics bufferGrph = Graphics.FromImage(buffer))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            bufferGrph.DrawRectangle(new Pen(Color.Blue, 1), 1, 1, 100, 100);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Invalidate the panel. This will lead to a call of 'panel1_Paint'Di2015NewLine        panel1.Invalidate();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
