2611845Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class Game1 : Microsoft.Xna.Framework.GameDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Set width, heightDi2015NewLine    const int WIDTH = 800;Di2015NewLine    const int HEIGHT = 600;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Used to randomly fill in initial data, not necessaryDi2015NewLine    Random rand;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Graphics and spritebatchDi2015NewLine    GraphicsDeviceManager graphics;Di2015NewLine    SpriteBatch spriteBatch;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Texture you will regenerate each call to updateDi2015NewLine    Texture2D texture;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Data array you perform calculations onDi2015NewLine    uint[] data;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Colors are represented in the texture as 0xAARRGGBB where:Di2015NewLine    // AA = alphaDi2015NewLine    // RR = redDi2015NewLine    // GG = greenDi2015NewLine    // BB = blueDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Set the first color to redDi2015NewLine    const uint COLOR0 = 0xFFFF0000;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Set the second color to blueDi2015NewLine    const uint COLOR1 = 0xFF0000FF;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Game1()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        graphics = new GraphicsDeviceManager(this);Di2015NewLine        Content.RootDirectory = "Content";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Set width, heightDi2015NewLine        graphics.PreferredBackBufferWidth = WIDTH;Di2015NewLine        graphics.PreferredBackBufferHeight = HEIGHT;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected override void Initialize()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        base.Initialize();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Seed random, initialize array with random picks of the 2 colorsDi2015NewLine        rand = new Random((int)DateTime.Now.Ticks);Di2015NewLine        data = new uint[WIDTH * HEIGHT];Di2015NewLine        loadInitialData();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected override void LoadContent()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Create a new SpriteBatch, which can be used to draw textures.Di2015NewLine        spriteBatch = new SpriteBatch(GraphicsDevice);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Create a new textureDi2015NewLine        texture = new Texture2D(GraphicsDevice, WIDTH, HEIGHT);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected override void Update(GameTime gameTime)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Allows the game to exitDi2015NewLine        if (GamePad.GetState(PlayerIndex.One).Buttons.Back == ButtonState.Pressed)Di2015NewLine            this.Exit();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Run-time error without thisDi2015NewLine        // Complains you can't modify a texture that has been set on the deviceDi2015NewLine        GraphicsDevice.Textures[0] = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Do the calculationsDi2015NewLine        updateData();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Update the texture for the next time it is drawn to the screenDi2015NewLine        texture.SetData(data);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        base.Update(gameTime);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected override void Draw(GameTime gameTime)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Draw the texture onceDi2015NewLine        spriteBatch.Begin();Di2015NewLine        spriteBatch.Draw(texture, Vector2.Zero, Color.Purple);Di2015NewLine        spriteBatch.End();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        base.Draw(gameTime);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void loadInitialData()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Don't know where the initial data comes fromDi2015NewLine        // Just populate the array with a random selection of the two colorsDi2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < WIDTH; i++)Di2015NewLine            for (int j = 0; j < HEIGHT; j++)Di2015NewLine                data[i * HEIGHT + j] = rand.Next(2) == 0 ? COLOR0 : COLOR1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void updateData()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Rough approximation of calculationsDi2015NewLine        for(int y = HEIGHT - 1; y >= 0; y--)Di2015NewLine            for (int x = WIDTH - 1; x >= 0; x--)Di2015NewLine                if (data[x * HEIGHT + y] == COLOR1)Di2015NewLine                    if (y + 1 < HEIGHT && data[x * HEIGHT + (y + 1)] == COLOR0)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        data[x * HEIGHT + (y + 1)] = data[x * HEIGHT + y];Di2015NewLine                        data[x * HEIGHT + y] = COLOR0;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

}Di2015NewLine        });Di2015NewLine        item.MouseUp += new MouseEventHandler((a, b) => { tr_MouseDown = false; mouseupdate(); });Di2015NewLine        item.MouseMove += new MouseEventHandler((a, 2616232Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic interface ISecurityPersistenceProviderDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    void SetAuthCookie( int version, string name, DateTime expireDate, bool persistent, string cookieData );Di2015NewLine    HttpCookie GetAuthCookie();Di2015NewLine    string GetAuthCookieValue( out string name );Di2015NewLine    void RemoveAuthCookie();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class FormsPersistenceProvider : ISecurityPersistenceProviderDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public void SetAuthCookie( int version, string name, DateTime expireDate, bool persistent, string cookieData )Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var ticket = new FormsAuthenticationTicket( version, name, DateTime.Now, expireDate, persistent, cookieData );Di2015NewLine        string secureTicket = FormsAuthentication.Encrypt( ticket );Di2015NewLine        var cookie = new HttpCookie( FormsAuthentication.FormsCookieName, secureTicket );Di2015NewLine        cookie.Expires = ticket.Expiration;Di2015NewLine        HttpContext.Current.Response.Cookies.Add( cookie );Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public HttpCookie GetAuthCookie()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        HttpCookie cookie = HttpContext.Current.Request.Cookies[ FormsAuthentication.FormsCookieName ];Di2015NewLine        return cookie;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public string GetAuthCookieValue( out string name )Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        HttpCookie cookie = GetAuthCookie();Di2015NewLine        FormsAuthenticationTicket ticket = FormsAuthentication.Decrypt( cookie.Value );Di2015NewLine        name = ticket.Name;Di2015NewLine        return ticket.UserData;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void RemoveAuthCookie()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        FormsAuthentication.SignOut();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2616232Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class SecurityManager<T,TPersistenceProvider,TUserProvider> Di2015NewLine    where T : classDi2015NewLine    where TPersistenceProvider : ISecurityPersistenceProviderDi2015NewLine    where TUserProvider : ISecurityUserProvider<T>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private readonly ISecurityPersistenceProvider persistenceProvider;Di2015NewLine    private readonly ISecurityUserProvider<T> userProvider;Di2015NewLine    // NOTE this constant is used to validate the validity of the cookie (see below)Di2015NewLine    private const int CookieParameterCount = 3;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public SecurityManager( ISecurityPersistenceProvider persistenceProvider, ISecurityUserProvider<T> userProvider )Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine         this.persistenceProvider = persistenceProvider;Di2015NewLine         this.userProvider = userProvider;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #region PropertiesDi2015NewLine    protected ISecurityPersistenceProvider PersistenceProviderDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return persistenceProvider; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    protected ISecurityUserProvider<T> UserProviderDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return userProvider; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public IIdentity CurrentIdentityDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return Thread.CurrentPrincipal.Identity; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public bool IsAuthenticatedDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        getDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            IPrincipal principal = Thread.CurrentPrincipal;Di2015NewLine            return principal != null && principal.Identity != null && principal.Identity.IsAuthenticated;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public bool IsInRole( string roleName )Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        IPrincipal principal = Thread.CurrentPrincipal;Di2015NewLine        return IsAuthenticated && principal.IsInRole( roleName );Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public string UserNameDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return IsAuthenticated ? CurrentIdentity.Name : ""; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    #endregionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #region AuthenticationDi2015NewLine    public AuthenticationResult Authenticate( string userName, string password, bool persistent, string visitorAddress )Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return Authenticate( null, userName, password, persistent, visitorAddress );Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public AuthenticationResult Authenticate( string customer, string userName, string password, bool persistent, string visitorAddress )Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        AuthenticationResult result = ValidateInput( userName, password );Di2015NewLine        if( ! result.Success )Di2015NewLine            return result;Di2015NewLine        string passwordHash = GetCryptographicHash( password );Di2015NewLine        T user = userProvider.AuthenticateUser( customer, userName, passwordHash );Di2015NewLine        if( user == null )Di2015NewLine            return new AuthenticationResult( false, "Unable to login using the specified credentials.", null );Di2015NewLine        if( ! IsAuthorizedVisitor( user, visitorAddress ) )Di2015NewLine            return new AuthenticationResult( false, "Credentials do not allow login from your current IP address.", null );Di2015NewLine        CurrentPrincipal = new CodeworksPrincipal<T>( userName, userProvider.GetRoles( user ), user );Di2015NewLine        // remember to change CookieParameterCount if you change parameter count hereDi2015NewLine        string cookieData = String.Format( "{0}|{1}|{2}", CurrentIdentity.Name, customer, CurrentPrincipal.AllRoles );Di2015NewLine        persistenceProvider.SetAuthCookie( 1, userName, DateTime.Now.AddMonths( 1 ), persistent, cookieData );Di2015NewLine        // TODO create an audit log entry for the current requestDi2015NewLine        return new AuthenticationResult( true, null, null );Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    private AuthenticationResult ValidateInput( string login, string password )Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var result = new AuthenticationResult( true, "Invalid or missing credentials." );Di2015NewLine        if( String.IsNullOrEmpty( login ) )Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            result.Success = false;Di2015NewLine            result.Errors.Add( "login", "You must specify an alias or email address." );Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if( String.IsNullOrEmpty( password ) )Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            result.Success = false;Di2015NewLine            result.Errors.Add( "password", "You must specify a password." );Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        // TODO add message to inform users of other requirements.Di2015NewLine        return result;            Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    #endregionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #region Cookie AuthenticationDi2015NewLine    public void CookieAuthenticate( string visitorAddress )Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        HttpCookie cookie = persistenceProvider.GetAuthCookie();Di2015NewLine        if( cookie != null )Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            string userName;Di2015NewLine            string userData = persistenceProvider.GetAuthCookieValue( out userName );Di2015NewLine            string[] cookieData = userData.Split( '|' );Di2015NewLine            // extract data from cookieDi2015NewLine            bool isValid = cookieData.Length == CookieParameterCount && Di2015NewLine                           ! string.IsNullOrEmpty( cookieData[ 0 ] ) &&Di2015NewLine                           cookieData[ 0 ] == userName &&Di2015NewLine                           IsAuthorizedVisitor( cookieData[ 1 ], cookieData[ 0 ], visitorAddress );Di2015NewLine            if( isValid )Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                string customer = cookieData[ 1 ];Di2015NewLine                string[] roles = cookieData[ 2 ].Split( ',' );Di2015NewLine                T user = userProvider.GetUser( customer, userName );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                CurrentPrincipal = new CodeworksPrincipal<T>( userName, roles, user );Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    #endregionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #region LogoutDi2015NewLine    public void Logout()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // logout the current userDi2015NewLine        if( HttpContext.Current.Request.IsAuthenticated || CurrentPrincipal != null )Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            long address = GetAddressFromString( HttpContext.Request.UserHostAddress );Di2015NewLine            // TODO add audit log entryDi2015NewLine            // sign out current userDi2015NewLine            persistenceProvider.RemoveAuthCookie();Di2015NewLine            CurrentPrincipal = null;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    #endregionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #region VisitorAddress ChecksDi2015NewLine    public long GetAddressFromString( string address )Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        IPAddress ipAddress;Di2015NewLine        if( IPAddress.TryParse( address, out ipAddress ) )Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            byte[] segments = ipAddress.GetAddressBytes();Di2015NewLine            long result = 0;Di2015NewLine            for( int i = 0; i < segments.Length; i++ )Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                result += segments[ i ] << (i * 8);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return result;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return long.MaxValue;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public bool IsAuthorizedVisitor( string customer, string userName, string visitorAddress )Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return IsAuthorizedVisitor( customer, userName, GetAddressFromString( visitorAddress ) );Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public bool IsAuthorizedVisitor( string customer, string userName, long visitorAddress )Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        T user = userProvider.GetUser( customer, userName );Di2015NewLine        return IsAuthorizedVisitor( user, visitorAddress );Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public bool IsAuthorizedVisitor( T user, string visitorAddress )Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return IsAuthorizedVisitor( user, GetAddressFromString( visitorAddress ) );Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public bool IsAuthorizedVisitor( T user, long visitorAddress )Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if( user == null || visitorAddress == 0 )Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLine        if( user.Hosts.Count == 0 )Di2015NewLine            return true;Di2015NewLine        foreach( Host host in user.Hosts )Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if( IsAuthorizedVisitor( host.HostAddress, host.HostMask, visitorAddress ) )Di2015NewLine                return true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return true;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public bool IsAuthorizedVisitor( long allowedAddress, long allowedMask, long visitorAddress )Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        long requireMask = allowedAddress & allowedMask;Di2015NewLine        return (visitorAddress & requireMask) == requireMask;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    #endregionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #region Cryptographic HelpersDi2015NewLine    public static string GetCryptographicHash( string password )Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        SHA256 hash = SHA256.Create();Di2015NewLine        byte[] input = Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes( password );Di2015NewLine        byte[] output = hash.ComputeHash( input );Di2015NewLine        return Convert.ToBase64String( output );Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    #endregionDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2616884Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IEnumerable<MyObject> ContainsOneOfTheseKeywords(Di2015NewLine        this IQueryable<MyObject> qry, List<string> keywords, char sep)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    List<List<MyObject>> parts = new List<List<MyObject>>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (string keyw in keywords)Di2015NewLine        parts.Add((Di2015NewLine            from obj in qryDi2015NewLine            where obj.MyProperty == keyw ||Di2015NewLine                  obj.MyProperty.IndexOf(sep + keyw + sep) != -1 ||Di2015NewLine                  obj.MyProperty.IndexOf(keyw + sep) >= 0 ||Di2015NewLine                  obj.MyProperty.IndexOf(sep + keyw) ==Di2015NewLine                      obj.MyProperty.Length - keyw.Length - 1Di2015NewLine            select obj).ToList());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    IEnumerable<MyObject> union = null;Di2015NewLine    bool first = true;Di2015NewLine    foreach (List<MyObject> part in parts)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (first)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            union = part;Di2015NewLine            first = false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine            union = union.Union(part);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return union.ToList();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

Allocated {1} MB", iDi2015NewLine                            , ((long)rowLen*i*Marshal.SizeOf(typeof(int))) >> 20 ));Di2015NewLine                        break;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                r.Add("Memory was successfully allocated");Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            catch (Exception e) {Di2015NewLine                r.Add(e.Message + e.StackTrace);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return r;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        #region LoggingDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private void Log(string s) {Di2015NewLine            listBox1.Items.Add(s);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private void Log(IEnumerable<string> s)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (s != null) {Di2015NewLine                foreach (var ss in s) {Di2015NewLine                    listBox1.Items.Add ( ss );Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        #endregionDi2015NewLine

     AddBreakpointsToProjectItem(objCodeElement)Di2015NewLine            NextDi2015NewLine        End IfDi2015NewLine    End SubDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Private Sub 2623039Di2015UniqueSeparator#include <iostream>Di2015NewLineusing namespace std;Di2015NewLine//...Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//...Di2015NewLineifstream ifs("filename", ios::in | ios::binary);Di2015NewLine//initialize buffer to 0xffffffffDi2015NewLineunsigned char buffer[4] = {0xff, 0xff, 0xff, 0xff};Di2015NewLinewhile(!ifs.eof())Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    //Shift to make space for new read.Di2015NewLine    buffer[0] = buffer[1];Di2015NewLine    buffer[1] = buffer[2];Di2015NewLine    buffer[2] = buffer[3];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //read next byte from fileDi2015NewLine    buffer[3] = ifs.get();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //see if the current buffer contains the start code.Di2015NewLine    if(buffer[0]==0x00 && buffer[1]==0x00 && buffer[2]==0x01 && buffer[3]==0xb6)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //vop start code foundDi2015NewLine        //Test for I-frameDi2015NewLine        unsigned char ch = ifs.get();Di2015NewLine        int vop_coding_type = (ch & 0xc0) >> 6;   //masks out the first 2 bits and shifts them to the least significant bits of the ucharDi2015NewLine        if(vop_coding_type == 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //It is an I-frameDi2015NewLine            //...Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2623560Di2015UniqueSeparator    public T getFromJSON<T>(String sel, String jSon)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        String[] id = sel.Split('.');Di2015NewLine        Object tmp = jSon;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < id.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            tmp = tmp.ToString().Split(new string[] { "\\"" + id[i] + "\\":" }, StringSplitOptions.None)[1];Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Boolean isString = false;Di2015NewLine        if (tmp.ToString().StartsWith("\\""))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            tmp = tmp.ToString().Substring(1);Di2015NewLine            isString = true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        tmp = tmp.ToString().Split(new char[] { '}', ']', '"' }, StringSplitOptions.None)[0];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (!isString && tmp.ToString().EndsWith(","))Di2015NewLine            tmp = tmp.ToString().Substring(0, tmp.ToString().Length - 1);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (typeof(T) == typeof(Int32))Di2015NewLine            tmp = Int32.Parse(tmp.ToString());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return (T)tmp;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

2624377Di2015UniqueSeparatorEndianAttribute
2624377Di2015UniqueSeparatorrawData
2624377Di2015UniqueSeparatorref
2624377Di2015UniqueSeparator[AttributeUsage(AttributeTargets.Field)]Di2015NewLinepublic class EndianAttribute : AttributeDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public Endianness Endianness { get; private set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public EndianAttribute(Endianness endianness)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.Endianness = endianness;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic enum EndiannessDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    BigEndian,Di2015NewLine    LittleEndianDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static void RespectEndianness(Type type, byte[] data)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var fields = type.GetFields().Where(f => f.IsDefined(typeof(EndianAttribute), false))Di2015NewLine        .Select(f => newDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Field = f,Di2015NewLine            Attribute = (EndianAttribute)f.GetCustomAttributes(typeof(EndianAttribute), false)[0],Di2015NewLine            Offset = Marshal.OffsetOf(type, f.Name).ToInt32()Di2015NewLine        }).ToList();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (var field in fields)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if ((field.Attribute.Endianness == Endianness.BigEndian && BitConverter.IsLittleEndian) ||Di2015NewLine            (field.Attribute.Endianness == Endianness.LittleEndian && !BitConverter.IsLittleEndian))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Array.Reverse(data, field.Offset, Marshal.SizeOf(field.Field.FieldType));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static T BytesToStruct<T>(byte[] rawData) where T : structDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    T result = default(T);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    RespectEndianness(typeof(T), rawData);     Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    GCHandle handle = GCHandle.Alloc(rawData, GCHandleType.Pinned);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    tryDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        IntPtr rawDataPtr = handle.AddrOfPinnedObject();Di2015NewLine        result = (T)Marshal.PtrToStructure(rawDataPtr, typeof(T));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    finallyDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        handle.Free();Di2015NewLine    }        Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return result;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static byte[] StructToBytes<T>(T data) where T : structDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    byte[] rawData = new byte[Marshal.SizeOf(data)];Di2015NewLine    GCHandle handle = GCHandle.Alloc(rawData, GCHandleType.Pinned);Di2015NewLine    tryDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        IntPtr rawDataPtr = handle.AddrOfPinnedObject();Di2015NewLine        Marshal.StructureToPtr(data, rawDataPtr, false);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    finallyDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        handle.Free();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    RespectEndianness(typeof(T), rawData);     Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return rawData;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2624847Di2015UniqueSeparatorPropertyCopy
2624847Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq.Expressions;Di2015NewLineusing System.Reflection;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace MiscUtil.ReflectionDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Generic class which copies to its target type from a sourceDi2015NewLine    /// type specified in the Copy method. The types are specifiedDi2015NewLine    /// separately to take advantage of type inference on genericDi2015NewLine    /// method arguments.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public static class PropertyCopy<TTarget> where TTarget : class, new()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Copies all readable properties from the source to a new instanceDi2015NewLine        /// of TTarget.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        public static TTarget CopyFrom<TSource>(TSource source) where TSource : classDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return PropertyCopier<TSource>.Copy(source);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Static class to efficiently store the compiled delegate which canDi2015NewLine        /// do the copying. We need a bit of work to ensure that exceptions areDi2015NewLine        /// appropriately propagated, as the exception is generated at type initializationDi2015NewLine        /// time, but we wish it to be thrown as an ArgumentException.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        private static class PropertyCopier<TSource> where TSource : classDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            private static readonly Func<TSource, TTarget> copier;Di2015NewLine            private static readonly Exception initializationException;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            internal static TTarget Copy(TSource source)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (initializationException != null)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    throw initializationException;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                if (source == null)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    throw new ArgumentNullException("source");Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                return copier(source);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            static PropertyCopier()Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                tryDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    copier = BuildCopier();Di2015NewLine                    initializationException = null;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                catch (Exception e)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    copier = null;Di2015NewLine                    initializationException = e;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            private static Func<TSource, TTarget> BuildCopier()Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                ParameterExpression sourceParameter = Expression.Parameter(typeof(TSource), "source");Di2015NewLine                var bindings = new List<MemberBinding>();Di2015NewLine                foreach (PropertyInfo sourceProperty in typeof(TSource).GetProperties())Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    if (!sourceProperty.CanRead)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        continue;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    PropertyInfo targetProperty = typeof(TTarget).GetProperty(sourceProperty.Name);Di2015NewLine                    if (targetProperty == null)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        throw new ArgumentException("Property " + sourceProperty.Name + " is not present and accessible in " + typeof(TTarget).FullName);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    if (!targetProperty.CanWrite)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        throw new ArgumentException("Property " + sourceProperty.Name + " is not writable in " + typeof(TTarget).FullName);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    if (!targetProperty.PropertyType.IsAssignableFrom(sourceProperty.PropertyType))Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        throw new ArgumentException("Property " + sourceProperty.Name + " has an incompatible type in " + typeof(TTarget).FullName);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    bindings.Add(Expression.Bind(targetProperty, Expression.Property(sourceParameter, sourceProperty)));Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                Expression initializer = Expression.MemberInit(Expression.New(typeof(TTarget)), bindings);Di2015NewLine                return Expression.Lambda<Func<TSource,TTarget>>(initializer, sourceParameter).Compile();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2625742Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //ACTUAL usageDi2015NewLine        //Setting up the interface injectionDi2015NewLine        IInjectableFactory.StaticInjectable = new ConcreteInjectable(1);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Injecting via the constructorDi2015NewLine        EverythingsInjected injected = Di2015NewLine            new EverythingsInjected(new ConcreteInjectable(100));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Injecting via the propertyDi2015NewLine        injected.PropertyInjected = new ConcreteInjectable(1000);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //using the injected itemsDi2015NewLine        injected.PrintInjectables();Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //FOR TESTING (normally done in a unit testing framework)Di2015NewLine        IInjectableFactory.StaticInjectable = new TestInjectable();Di2015NewLine        EverythingsInjected testInjected = Di2015NewLine            new EverythingsInjected(new TestInjectable());Di2015NewLine        testInjected.PropertyInjected = new TestInjectable();Di2015NewLine        //this would be an assert of some kindDi2015NewLine        testInjected.PrintInjectables(); Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.Read();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //the inteface you want to represent the decoupled classDi2015NewLine    public interface IInjectable { void DoSomething(string myStr); }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //the "real" injectableDi2015NewLine    public class ConcreteInjectable : IInjectableDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        private int _myId;Di2015NewLine        public ConcreteInjectable(int myId) { _myId = myId; }Di2015NewLine        public void DoSomething(string myStr)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Id:{0} Data:{1}", _myId, myStr);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //the place to get the IInjectable (not in consuming class)Di2015NewLine    public static class IInjectableFactoryDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public static IInjectable StaticInjectable { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //the consuming class - with three types of injection usedDi2015NewLine    public class EverythingsInjectedDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        private IInjectable _interfaceInjected;Di2015NewLine        private IInjectable _constructorInjected;Di2015NewLine        private IInjectable _propertyInjected;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //property allows the setting of a different injectableDi2015NewLine        public IInjectable PropertyInjectedDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            get { return _propertyInjected; }Di2015NewLine            set { _propertyInjected = value; }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //constructor requires the loosely coupled injectableDi2015NewLine        public EverythingsInjected(IInjectable constructorInjected)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //have to set the default with property injectedDi2015NewLine            _propertyInjected = GetIInjectable();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //retain the constructor injected injectableDi2015NewLine            _constructorInjected = constructorInjected;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //using basic interface injectionDi2015NewLine            _interfaceInjected = GetIInjectable();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //retrieves the loosely coupled injectableDi2015NewLine        private IInjectable GetIInjectable()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return IInjectableFactory.StaticInjectable;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //method that consumes the injectablesDi2015NewLine        public void PrintInjectables()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            _interfaceInjected.DoSomething("Interface Injected");Di2015NewLine            _constructorInjected.DoSomething("Constructor Injected");Di2015NewLine            _propertyInjected.DoSomething("PropertyInjected");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //the "fake" injectableDi2015NewLine    public class TestInjectable : IInjectableDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public void DoSomething(string myStr)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Id:{0} Data:{1}", -10000, myStr + " For TEST");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
2625742Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        ServiceFactory factory = new ServiceFactory(false);Di2015NewLine        //first call hits the webserviceDi2015NewLine        GetServiceQuestions(factory);Di2015NewLine        //hists the cache next timeDi2015NewLine        GetServiceQuestions(factory);Di2015NewLine        //can refresh on demandDi2015NewLine        factory.ResetCache = true;Di2015NewLine        GetServiceQuestions(factory);Di2015NewLine        Console.Read();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //where the call to the "service" happensDi2015NewLine    private static List<Question> GetServiceQuestions(ServiceFactory factory)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var myFirstService = factory.GetSATService();Di2015NewLine        var firstServiceQuestions = myFirstService.GetAllQuestions();Di2015NewLine        foreach (Question question in firstServiceQuestions)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine(question.Text);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return firstServiceQuestions;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//this stands in place of your xml fileDi2015NewLinepublic static class DataStoreDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static List<Question> Questions;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//a simple questionDi2015NewLinepublic struct QuestionDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private string _text;Di2015NewLine    public string Text { get { return _text; } }Di2015NewLine    public Question(string text)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _text = text;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//the contract for the real and fake "service"Di2015NewLinepublic interface ISATServiceDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    List<Question> GetAllQuestions();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//hits the webservice and refreshes the storeDi2015NewLinepublic class ServiceWrapper : ISATServiceDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public List<Question> GetAllQuestions()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("From WebService");Di2015NewLine        //this would be your webservice callDi2015NewLine        DataStore.Questions = new List<Question>()Di2015NewLine                   {Di2015NewLine                       new Question("How do you do?"), Di2015NewLine                       new Question("How is the weather?")Di2015NewLine                   };Di2015NewLine        //always return from your local datastoreDi2015NewLine        return DataStore.Questions;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//accesses the data store for the questionsDi2015NewLinepublic class FakeService : ISATServiceDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public List<Question> GetAllQuestions()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("From Fake Service (cache):");Di2015NewLine        return DataStore.Questions;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//The object that decides on using the cache or notDi2015NewLinepublic class ServiceFactoryDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public  bool ResetCache{ get; set;}Di2015NewLine    public ServiceFactory(bool resetCache)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        ResetCache = resetCache;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public ISATService GetSATService()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (DataStore.Questions == null || ResetCache)Di2015NewLine            return new ServiceWrapper();Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine            return new FakeService();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2626209Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq;Di2015NewLineusing System.Text;Di2015NewLineusing System.IO;Di2015NewLineusing System.Security.Cryptography;Di2015NewLineusing System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates;Di2015NewLineusing System.Runtime.InteropServices;Di2015NewLineusing System.ComponentModel;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace LargeCMSDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    class CMSDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // File stream to use in callback functionDi2015NewLine        private FileStream m_callbackFile;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Streaming callback function for encodingDi2015NewLine        private Boolean StreamOutputCallback(IntPtr pvArg, IntPtr pbData, int cbData, Boolean fFinal)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Write all bytes to encoded fileDi2015NewLine            Byte[] bytes = new Byte[cbData];Di2015NewLine            Marshal.Copy(pbData, bytes, 0, cbData);Di2015NewLine            m_callbackFile.Write(bytes, 0, cbData);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (fFinal)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // This is the last piece. Close the fileDi2015NewLine                m_callbackFile.Flush();Di2015NewLine                m_callbackFile.Close();Di2015NewLine                m_callbackFile = null;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Encode CMS with streaming to support large dataDi2015NewLine        public void Encode(X509Certificate2 cert, FileStream inFile, FileStream outFile)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // VariablesDi2015NewLine            Win32.CMSG_SIGNER_ENCODE_INFO SignerInfo;Di2015NewLine            Win32.CMSG_SIGNED_ENCODE_INFO SignedInfo;Di2015NewLine            Win32.CMSG_STREAM_INFO StreamInfo;Di2015NewLine            Win32.CERT_CONTEXT[] CertContexts = null;Di2015NewLine            Win32.BLOB[] CertBlobs;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            X509Chain chain = null;Di2015NewLine            X509ChainElement[] chainElements = null;Di2015NewLine            X509Certificate2[] certs = null;Di2015NewLine            RSACryptoServiceProvider key = null;Di2015NewLine            BinaryReader stream = null;Di2015NewLine            GCHandle gchandle = new GCHandle();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            IntPtr hProv = IntPtr.Zero;Di2015NewLine            IntPtr SignerInfoPtr = IntPtr.Zero;Di2015NewLine            IntPtr CertBlobsPtr = IntPtr.Zero;Di2015NewLine            IntPtr hMsg = IntPtr.Zero;Di2015NewLine            IntPtr pbPtr = IntPtr.Zero;Di2015NewLine            Byte[] pbData;Di2015NewLine            int dwFileSize;Di2015NewLine            int dwRemaining;Di2015NewLine            int dwSize;Di2015NewLine            Boolean bResult = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Get data to encodeDi2015NewLine                dwFileSize = (int)inFile.Length;Di2015NewLine                stream = new BinaryReader(inFile);Di2015NewLine                pbData = stream.ReadBytes(dwFileSize);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Prepare stream for encoded infoDi2015NewLine                m_callbackFile = outFile;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Get cert chainDi2015NewLine                chain = new X509Chain();Di2015NewLine                chain.Build(cert);Di2015NewLine                chainElements = new X509ChainElement[chain.ChainElements.Count];Di2015NewLine                chain.ChainElements.CopyTo(chainElements, 0);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Get certs in chainDi2015NewLine                certs = new X509Certificate2[chainElements.Length];Di2015NewLine                for (int i = 0; i < chainElements.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    certs[i] = chainElements[i].Certificate;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Get context of all certs in chainDi2015NewLine                CertContexts = new Win32.CERT_CONTEXT[certs.Length];Di2015NewLine                for (int i = 0; i < certs.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    CertContexts[i] = (Win32.CERT_CONTEXT)Marshal.PtrToStructure(certs[i].Handle, typeof(Win32.CERT_CONTEXT));Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Get cert blob of all certsDi2015NewLine                CertBlobs = new Win32.BLOB[CertContexts.Length];Di2015NewLine                for (int i = 0; i < CertContexts.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    CertBlobs[i].cbData = CertContexts[i].cbCertEncoded;Di2015NewLine                    CertBlobs[i].pbData = CertContexts[i].pbCertEncoded;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Get CSP of client certificateDi2015NewLine                key = (RSACryptoServiceProvider)certs[0].PrivateKey;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                bResult = Win32.CryptAcquireContext(Di2015NewLine                    ref hProv,Di2015NewLine                    key.CspKeyContainerInfo.KeyContainerName,Di2015NewLine                    key.CspKeyContainerInfo.ProviderName,Di2015NewLine                    key.CspKeyContainerInfo.ProviderType,Di2015NewLine                    0Di2015NewLine                );Di2015NewLine                if (!bResult)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    throw new Exception("CryptAcquireContext error #" + Marshal.GetLastWin32Error().ToString(), new Win32Exception(Marshal.GetLastWin32Error()));Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Populate Signer Info structDi2015NewLine                SignerInfo = new Win32.CMSG_SIGNER_ENCODE_INFO();Di2015NewLine                SignerInfo.cbSize = Marshal.SizeOf(SignerInfo);Di2015NewLine                SignerInfo.pCertInfo = CertContexts[0].pCertInfo;Di2015NewLine                SignerInfo.hCryptProvOrhNCryptKey = hProv;Di2015NewLine                SignerInfo.dwKeySpec = (int)key.CspKeyContainerInfo.KeyNumber;Di2015NewLine                SignerInfo.HashAlgorithm.pszObjId = Win32.szOID_OIWSEC_sha1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Populate Signed Info structDi2015NewLine                SignedInfo = new Win32.CMSG_SIGNED_ENCODE_INFO();Di2015NewLine                SignedInfo.cbSize = Marshal.SizeOf(SignedInfo);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                SignedInfo.cSigners = 1;Di2015NewLine                SignerInfoPtr = Marshal.AllocHGlobal(Marshal.SizeOf(SignerInfo));Di2015NewLine                Marshal.StructureToPtr(SignerInfo, SignerInfoPtr, false);Di2015NewLine                SignedInfo.rgSigners = SignerInfoPtr;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                SignedInfo.cCertEncoded = CertBlobs.Length;Di2015NewLine                CertBlobsPtr = Marshal.AllocHGlobal(Marshal.SizeOf(CertBlobs[0]) * CertBlobs.Length);Di2015NewLine                for (int i = 0; i < CertBlobs.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    Marshal.StructureToPtr(CertBlobs[i], new IntPtr(CertBlobsPtr.ToInt64() + (Marshal.SizeOf(CertBlobs[i]) * i)), false);Di2015NewLine                }               Di2015NewLine                SignedInfo.rgCertEncoded = CertBlobsPtr;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Populate Stream Info structDi2015NewLine                StreamInfo = new Win32.CMSG_STREAM_INFO();Di2015NewLine                StreamInfo.cbContent = dwFileSize;Di2015NewLine                StreamInfo.pfnStreamOutput = new Win32.StreamOutputCallbackDelegate(StreamOutputCallback);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // TODO: CMSG_DETACHED_FLAGDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Open message to encodeDi2015NewLine                hMsg = Win32.CryptMsgOpenToEncode(Di2015NewLine                    Win32.X509_ASN_ENCODING | Win32.PKCS_7_ASN_ENCODING,Di2015NewLine                    0,Di2015NewLine                    Win32.CMSG_SIGNED,Di2015NewLine                    ref SignedInfo,Di2015NewLine                    null,Di2015NewLine                    ref StreamInfoDi2015NewLine                );Di2015NewLine                if (hMsg.Equals(IntPtr.Zero))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    throw new Exception("CryptMsgOpenToEncode error #" + Marshal.GetLastWin32Error().ToString(), new Win32Exception(Marshal.GetLastWin32Error()));Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Process the whole messageDi2015NewLine                gchandle = GCHandle.Alloc(pbData, GCHandleType.Pinned);Di2015NewLine                pbPtr = gchandle.AddrOfPinnedObject();Di2015NewLine                dwRemaining = dwFileSize;Di2015NewLine                dwSize = (dwFileSize < 1024 * 1000 * 100) ? dwFileSize : 1024 * 1000 * 100;Di2015NewLine                while (dwRemaining > 0)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    // Update message piece by piece     Di2015NewLine                    bResult = Win32.CryptMsgUpdate(Di2015NewLine                        hMsg,Di2015NewLine                        pbPtr,Di2015NewLine                        dwSize,Di2015NewLine                        (dwRemaining <= dwSize) ? true : falseDi2015NewLine                    );Di2015NewLine                    if (!bResult)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        throw new Exception("CryptMsgUpdate error #" + Marshal.GetLastWin32Error().ToString(), new Win32Exception(Marshal.GetLastWin32Error()));Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    // Move to the next pieceDi2015NewLine                    pbPtr = new IntPtr(pbPtr.ToInt64() + dwSize);Di2015NewLine                    dwRemaining -= dwSize;Di2015NewLine                    if (dwRemaining < dwSize)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        dwSize = dwRemaining;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            finallyDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Clean upDi2015NewLine                if (gchandle.IsAllocated)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    gchandle.Free();Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                if (stream != null)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    stream.Close();Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                if (m_callbackFile != null)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    m_callbackFile.Close();Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                if (!CertBlobsPtr.Equals(IntPtr.Zero))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    Marshal.FreeHGlobal(CertBlobsPtr);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (!SignerInfoPtr.Equals(IntPtr.Zero))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine Win32.CryptMsgClose(hMsg);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Decode CMS with streaming to support large     );Di2015NewLine                if (hMsg.Equals(IntPtr.Zero))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    throw new Exception("CryptMsgOpenToDecode error #" +      if (!bResult)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        throw new Exception("CryptMsgUpdate error #" + Marshal.GetLastWin32Error().ToString(), new                 dwSize = dwRemaining;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Get signer certificate infoDi2015NewLine );Di2015NewLine                if (!bResult)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    throw new Exception("CryptMsgGetParam error #" + Marshal.GetLastWin32Error().ToString(), new      }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Open a cert store in memory with the certs from the messageDi2015NewLine                hStore = Win32.CertOpenStore(Di2015NewLine      SignerCertContext.pCertInfoDi2015NewLine                );Di2015NewLine                if (!bResult)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    throw new 2630844Di2015UniqueSeparatorstring hex_data = "7DA34FFFFFFFFFC0";Di2015NewLine        Int64 int_datetime = Convert.ToInt64(hex_data, 16);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int year = (int)(int_datetime >> 52);Di2015NewLine        int month = (int)((int_datetime >> 48) & 0x0F);Di2015NewLine        int day = (int)(((int_datetime >> 43) & 0x1F));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int hour = (int)(((int_datetime >> 38) & 0x1F)) > 24 ? 0 : (int)(((int_datetime >> 38) & 0x1F));Di2015NewLine        int min = (int)(((int_datetime >> 32) & 0x3F)) > 60 ? 0 : (int)(((int_datetime >> 32) & 0x3F));Di2015NewLine        int sec = (int)(((int_datetime >> 26) & 0x3F)) > 60 ? 0 : (int)(((int_datetime >> 26) & 0x3F));Di2015NewLine        int mili_sec = (int)(((int_datetime >> 16) & 0x3FF)) > 100 ? 0 : (int)(((int_datetime >> 16) & 0x3FF));Di2015NewLine        int micro_sec = (int)(((int_datetime >> 6) & 0x3FF)) > 100 ? 0 : (int)(((int_datetime >> 6) & 0x3FF));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        string str_date_time = year.ToString("D4") + "/" + month.ToString("D2") + "/" + day.ToString("D2") + " " + hour.ToString("D2") + ":" + min.ToString("D2") + ":" Di2015NewLine            + sec.ToString("D2") + "." + mili_sec.ToString("D3");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        DateTime date_time_dt=DateTime.Parse(str_date_time);Di2015NewLine

2632825Di2015UniqueSeparatorfunction readToken() // note: returns only one token each timeDi2015NewLine    while !eofDi2015NewLine        c = peekChar()Di2015NewLine        if c in A-Za-zDi2015NewLine            return readIdentifier()Di2015NewLine        else if c in 0-9Di2015NewLine            return readInteger()Di2015NewLine        else if c in ' \\n\\r\\t\\v\\f'Di2015NewLine            nextChar()Di2015NewLine        ...Di2015NewLine    return EOFDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinefunction readIdentifier()Di2015NewLine    ident = ""Di2015NewLine    while !eofDi2015NewLine        c = nextChar()Di2015NewLine        if c in A-Za-z0-9Di2015NewLine            ident.append(c)Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine            return Token(Identifier, ident)Di2015NewLine            // or maybe...Di2015NewLine            return Identifier(ident)Di2015NewLine

2634884Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class BoundedPriorityQueue<T>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private object locker;Di2015NewLine    private int maxSize;Di2015NewLine    private int count;Di2015NewLine    private LinkedList<T>[] Buckets;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public BoundedPriorityQueue(int buckets, int maxSize)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.locker = new object();Di2015NewLine        this.maxSize = maxSize;Di2015NewLine        this.count = 0;Di2015NewLine        this.Buckets = new LinkedList<T>[buckets];Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < Buckets.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            this.Buckets[i] = new LinkedList<T>();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public bool TryUnsafeEnqueue(T item, int priority)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (priority < 0 || priority >= Buckets.Length)Di2015NewLine            throw new IndexOutOfRangeException("priority");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Buckets[priority].AddLast(item);Di2015NewLine        count++;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (count > maxSize)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            UnsafeDiscardLowestItem();Di2015NewLine            Debug.Assert(count <= maxSize, "Collection Count should be less than or equal to MaxSize");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return true; // always succeedsDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public bool TryUnsafeDequeue(out T res)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        LinkedList<T> bucket = Buckets.FirstOrDefault(x => x.Count > 0);Di2015NewLine        if (bucket != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            res = bucket.First.Value;Di2015NewLine            bucket.RemoveFirst();Di2015NewLine            count--;Di2015NewLine            return true; // found item, succeedsDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        res = default(T);Di2015NewLine        return false; // didn't find an item, failDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void UnsafeDiscardLowestItem()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        LinkedList<T> bucket = Buckets.Reverse().FirstOrDefault(x => x.Count > 0);Di2015NewLine        if (bucket != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            bucket.RemoveLast();Di2015NewLine            count--;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public bool TryEnqueue(T item, int priority)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        lock (locker)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return TryUnsafeEnqueue(item, priority);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public bool TryDequeue(out T res)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        lock (locker)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return TryUnsafeDequeue(out res);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public int CountDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { lock (locker) { return count; } }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public int MaxSizeDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return maxSize; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public object SyncRootDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return locker; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
2634884Di2015UniqueSeparatorSyncRoot
2634888Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void CopyWithProgress(string[] filenames)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Display the ProgressBar control.Di2015NewLine    pBar1.Visible = true;Di2015NewLine    // Set Minimum to 1 to represent the first file being copied.Di2015NewLine    pBar1.Minimum = 1;Di2015NewLine    // Set Maximum to the total number of files to copy.Di2015NewLine    pBar1.Maximum = filenames.Length;Di2015NewLine    // Set the initial value of the ProgressBar.Di2015NewLine    pBar1.Value = 1;Di2015NewLine    // Set the Step property to a value of 1 to represent each file being copied.Di2015NewLine    pBar1.Step = 1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Loop through all files to copy.Di2015NewLine    for (int x = 1; x <= filenames.Length; x++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Copy the file and increment the ProgressBar if successful.Di2015NewLine        if(CopyFile(filenames[x-1]) == true)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Perform the increment on the ProgressBar.Di2015NewLine            pBar1.PerformStep();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2635928Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static List<string> PermuteWords(string s)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string[] ss = s.Split(new string[] {" "}, StringSplitOptions.RemoveEmptyEntries);Di2015NewLine        bool[] used = new bool[ss.Length];Di2015NewLine        string res = "";Di2015NewLine        List<string> list = new List<string>();Di2015NewLine        permute(ss, used, res, 0, list);Di2015NewLine        return list;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static void permute(string[] ss, bool[] used, string res, int level, List<string> list)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (level == ss.Length && res != "")Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            list.Add(res);Di2015NewLine            return;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < ss.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (used[i]) continue;Di2015NewLine            used[i] = true;Di2015NewLine            permute(ss, used, res + " " + ss[i], level + 1, list);Di2015NewLine            used[i] = false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

ex.FieldName, ex.Message);Di2015NewLine                modelState.SetModelValue(prefix + "." + ex.FieldName, collection.ToValueProvider()[ex.FieldName]);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine 2641383Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static List<int> AllIndexesOf(this string str, string value) {Di2015NewLine    if (String.IsNullOrEmpty(value))Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentException("the string to find may not be empty", "value");Di2015NewLine    List<int> indexes = new List<int>();Di2015NewLine    for (int index = 0;; index += value.Length) {Di2015NewLine        index = str.IndexOf(value, index);Di2015NewLine        if (index == -1)Di2015NewLine            return indexes;Di2015NewLine        indexes.Add(index);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

DependencyProperty.RegisterAttached("DisplayMemberMember", typeof(string), typeof(GridViewColumns), new UIPropertyMetadata(null));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static void ColumnsSourceChanged(DependencyObject obj, DependencyPropertyChangedEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            GridView gridView = obj as GridView;Di2015NewLine            if (gridView != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                gridView.Columns.Clear();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (e.OldValue != null)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    ICollectionView view = CollectionViewSource.GetDefaultView(e.OldValue);Di2015NewLine                    if (view != null)Di2015NewLine                        RemoveHandlers(gridView, view);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (e.NewValue != null)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    ICollectionView view = CollectionViewSource.GetDefaultView(e.NewValue);Di2015NewLine                    if (view != null)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        AddHandlers(gridView, view);Di2015NewLine                        CreateColumns(gridView, view);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static IDictionary<ICollectionView, List<GridView>> _gridViewsByColumnsSource =Di2015NewLine            new Dictionary<ICollectionView, List<GridView>>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static List<GridView> GetGridViewsForColumnSource(ICollectionView columnSource)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            List<GridView> gridViews;Di2015NewLine            if (!_gridViewsByColumnsSource.TryGetValue(columnSource, out gridViews))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                gridViews = new List<GridView>();Di2015NewLine                _gridViewsByColumnsSource.Add(columnSource, gridViews);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return gridViews;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static void AddHandlers(GridView gridView, ICollectionView view)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            GetGridViewsForColumnSource(view).Add(gridView);Di2015NewLine            view.CollectionChanged += ColumnsSource_CollectionChanged;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static void CreateColumns(GridView gridView, ICollectionView view)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            foreach (var item in view)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                GridViewColumn column = CreateColumn(gridView, item);Di2015NewLine                gridView.Columns.Add(column);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static void RemoveHandlers(GridView gridView, ICollectionView view)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            view.CollectionChanged -= ColumnsSource_CollectionChanged;Di2015NewLine            GetGridViewsForColumnSource(view).Remove(gridView);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static void ColumnsSource_CollectionChanged(object sender, NotifyCollectionChangedEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            ICollectionView view = sender as ICollectionView;Di2015NewLine            var gridViews = GetGridViewsForColumnSource(view);Di2015NewLine            if (gridViews == null || gridViews.Count == 0)Di2015NewLine                return;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            switch (e.Action)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                case NotifyCollectionChangedAction.Add:Di2015NewLine                    foreach (var gridView in gridViews)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        for (int i = 0; i < e.NewItems.Count; i++)Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            GridViewColumn column = CreateColumn(gridView, e.NewItems[i]);Di2015NewLine                            gridView.Columns.Insert(e.NewStartingIndex + i, column);Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine                case NotifyCollectionChangedAction.Move:Di2015NewLine                    foreach (var gridView in gridViews)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        List<GridViewColumn> columns = new List<GridViewColumn>();Di2015NewLine                        for (int i = 0; i < e.OldItems.Count; i++)Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            GridViewColumn column = gridView.Columns[e.OldStartingIndex + i];Di2015NewLine                            columns.Add(column);Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                        for (int i = 0; i < e.NewItems.Count; i++)Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            GridViewColumn column = columns[i];Di2015NewLine                            gridView.Columns.Insert(e.NewStartingIndex + i, column);Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine                case NotifyCollectionChangedAction.Remove:Di2015NewLine                    foreach (var gridView in gridViews)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        for (int i = 0; i < e.OldItems.Count; i++)Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            gridView.Columns.RemoveAt(e.OldStartingIndex);Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine                case NotifyCollectionChangedAction.Replace:Di2015NewLine                    foreach (var gridView in gridViews)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        for (int i = 0; i < e.NewItems.Count; i++)Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            GridViewColumn column = CreateColumn(gridView, e.NewItems[i]);Di2015NewLine                            gridView.Columns[e.NewStartingIndex + i] = column;Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine                case NotifyCollectionChangedAction.Reset:Di2015NewLine                    foreach (var gridView in gridViews)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        gridView.Columns.Clear();Di2015NewLine                        CreateColumns(gridView, sender as ICollectionView);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine                default:Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static GridViewColumn CreateColumn(GridView gridView, object columnSource)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            GridViewColumn column = new GridViewColumn();Di2015NewLine            string headerTextMember = GetHeaderTextMember(gridView);Di2015NewLine            string displayMemberMember = GetDisplayMemberMember(gridView);Di2015NewLine            if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(headerTextMember))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                column.Header = GetPropertyValue(columnSource, headerTextMember);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(displayMemberMember))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                string propertyName = GetPropertyValue(columnSource, displayMemberMember) as string;Di2015NewLine                column.DisplayMemberBinding = new Binding(propertyName);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return column;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static object GetPropertyValue(object obj, string propertyName)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (obj != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                PropertyInfo prop = obj.GetType().GetProperty(propertyName);Di2015NewLine                if (prop != null)Di2015NewLine                    return prop.GetValue(obj, null);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return null;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2650210Di2015UniqueSeparator    void LingeringClose ()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int waited = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (!Connected)Di2015NewLine            return;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        try {Di2015NewLine            Socket.Shutdown (SocketShutdown.Send);Di2015NewLine            DateTime start = DateTime.UtcNow;Di2015NewLine            while (waited < max_useconds_to_linger) {Di2015NewLine                int nread = 0;Di2015NewLine                try {Di2015NewLine                    if (!Socket.Poll (useconds_to_linger, SelectMode.SelectRead))Di2015NewLine                        break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    if (buffer == null)Di2015NewLine                        buffer = new byte [512];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    nread = Socket.Receive (buffer, 0, buffer.Length, 0);Di2015NewLine                } catch { }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (nread == 0)Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                waited += (int) (DateTime.UtcNow - start).TotalMilliseconds * 1000;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        } catch {Di2015NewLine            // ignore - we don't care, we're closing anywayDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

2650649Di2015UniqueSeparatorList<T[]> CreateSubsets<T>(T[] originalArray)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    List<T[]> subsets = new List<T[]>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < originalArray.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int subsetCount = subsets.Count;Di2015NewLine        subsets.Add(new T[] { originalArray[i] });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int j = 0; j < subsetCount; j++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            T[] newSubset = new T[subsets[j].Length + 1];Di2015NewLine            subsets[j].CopyTo(newSubset, 0);Di2015NewLine            newSubset[newSubset.Length - 1] = originalArray[i];Di2015NewLine            subsets.Add(newSubset);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return subsets;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2652157Di2015UniqueSeparator// You'll need some state object, if you don't already have oneDi2015NewLineclass AsyncServerStateDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine   public byte[] Buffer = new byte[8192]; // 8K bufferDi2015NewLine   public StringBuilder Content = new StringBuilder0; // Place to store the content as it's receivedDi2015NewLine   public SocketAsyncEventArgs ReadEventArgs = new SocketAsyncEventArgs();Di2015NewLine   public Socket Client;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// You'll need to setup the state where ever you process your connectDi2015NewLine// something similar to this.Di2015NewLinevoid Accept_Completed(object sender, SocketAsyncEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (e.SocketError == SocketError.Success)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Socket client = e.AcceptSocket;Di2015NewLine        AsyncServerState state = new AsyncServerState();Di2015NewLine        state.ReadEventArgs.AcceptSocket = client;Di2015NewLine        state.ReadEventArgs.Completed += new EventHandler(                                              IO_Completed);Di2015NewLine        state.ReadEventArgs.UserToken = state;Di2015NewLine        state.Client = client;Di2015NewLine        state.ReadEventArgs.SetBuffer(state.Buffer, 0, state.Buffer.Length);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (!client.ReceiveAsync(state.ReadEventArgs))Di2015NewLine        {   Di2015NewLine            // Call completed synchonouslyDi2015NewLine            ProcessReceive(state.ReadEventArgs);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    ProcessAccept(e);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate void ProcessReceive(SocketAsyncEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{        Di2015NewLine    var state = e.UserToken as AsyncServerState;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Check if the remote host closed the connection.Di2015NewLine    if (e.BytesTransferred > 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (e.SocketError == SocketError.Success)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Get the message received from the listener.Di2015NewLine            sting content = Encoding.ASCII.GetString(state.Buffer, 0, e.BytesTransferred);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Append the received data to our stateDi2015NewLine            state.Content.Append(content);                          Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Increment the count of the total bytes receive by the serverDi2015NewLine            Interlocked.Add(ref this.totalBytesRead, bytesTransferred);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (content.IndexOf(Convert.ToString((char)3)) > -1)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Final Message stored in our stateDi2015NewLine                string finalContent = state.Content.ToString();Di2015NewLine                return;                Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // You need to issue another ReceiveAsync, you can't just call ProcessReceive againDi2015NewLine                if (!state.Client.ReceiveAsync(state.ReadEventArgs))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    // Call completed synchonouslyDi2015NewLine                    ProcessReceive(state.ReadEventArgs);Di2015NewLine                }                Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            this.CloseClientSocket(e);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2652184Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic object MyPropertyDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine   set { _MyProperty = Validate("MyProperty", value, _MyProperty); }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate Dictionary<string, Func<object, string>> ValidationFunctions;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate object Validate(string propertyName, object value, object field)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine   Errors[propertyName] = null;Di2015NewLine   if (value == field)Di2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine      return;Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLine   if (!ValidationFunctions.ContainsKey(propertyName))Di2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine      return value;Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLine   Errors[propertyName] = ValidationFunctions[propertyName](value);Di2015NewLine   return (Errors[propertyName] == null) Di2015NewLine      ? value Di2015NewLine      : field;Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2655082Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic interface IRepository<T> where T : PersistentObjectDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    T Get(int id);        Di2015NewLine    void Save(T e);Di2015NewLine    void Delete(T e);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
2655082Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic abstract class CacheRepository<T> : IRepository<T> where T : PersistentObjectDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private const string CacheKeyPrefix = "RepoCache-";Di2015NewLine    private string GetCacheKey(int id)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return CacheKeyPrefix + typeof(T).FullName + "-" + id.ToString();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public T Get(int id)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string cacheKey = GetCacheKey(id);Di2015NewLine        T obj = CacheManager.GetItemFromCache<T>(cacheKey);Di2015NewLine        if (obj == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            obj = this.GetData(id);Di2015NewLine            if (obj != null)Di2015NewLine                CacheManager.AddItemToCache(obj, cacheKey);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return obj;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Save(T obj)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string cacheKey = GetCacheKey(obj.ID);Di2015NewLine        this.SaveData(obj);Di2015NewLine        CacheManager.AddItemToCache(obj, cacheKey);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Delete(T obj)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string cacheKey = GetCacheKey(obj.ID);Di2015NewLine        this.DeleteData(obj);Di2015NewLine        CacheManager.RemoveItemFromCache(cacheKey);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected abstract T GetData(int id);Di2015NewLine    protected abstract void SaveData(T obj);Di2015NewLine    protected abstract void DeleteData(T obj);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2656073Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic void Execute()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    isExecuting = true;Di2015NewLine    byte[] data;Di2015NewLine    byte[] cmpData;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //create temp zip fileDi2015NewLine    OnMessage("Reading file to memory");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    byte[] data = File.ReadAllBytes(  PathToFile );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    OnMessage("Zipping file to memory");Di2015NewLine    byte[] compressedData = Compress(data);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    OnMessage("Saving file to database");Di2015NewLine    SaveToDatabase( compressedData );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    OnMessage("File Saved");Di2015NewLine    isExecuting = false;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate void SaveToDatabase( byte[] data )Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine     using ( var cmd = Conn.CreateCommand() )Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        cmd.CommandText = @"MergeFileUploads";Di2015NewLine        cmd.CommandType = CommandType.StoredProcedure;Di2015NewLine        cmd.Parameters.AddWithValue("@File", data );Di2015NewLine        cmd.Parameters["@File"].DbType = DbType.Binary;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        cmd.Parameters.Add("@SourceField");Di2015NewLine        var parameter = cmd.Parameters["@SourceField"];Di2015NewLine        parameter.DbType = DbType.Int32;Di2015NewLine        parameter.Direction = ParameterDirection.Output;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        cmd.ExecuteNonQuery();Di2015NewLine        sourceFileId = (int)parameter.Value;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static byte[] Compress( byte[] data )Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var output = new MemoryStream();Di2015NewLine    using ( var gzip = new GZipStream( output, CompressionMode.Compress, true ) )Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        gzip.Write( data, 0, data.Length );Di2015NewLine        gzip.Close();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return output.ToArray();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineprivate static byte[] Decompress( byte[] data )Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var output = new MemoryStream();Di2015NewLine    var input = new MemoryStream();Di2015NewLine    input.Write( data, 0, data.Length );Di2015NewLine    input.Position = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    using ( var gzip = new GZipStream( input, CompressionMode.Decompress, true ) )Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var buff = new byte[64];Di2015NewLine        var read = gzip.Read( buff, 0, buff.Length );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        while ( read > 0 )Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            output.Write( buff, 0, read );Di2015NewLine            read = gzip.Read( buff, 0, buff.Length );Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        gzip.Close();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return output.ToArray();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
