charset=utf-8",Di2015NewLine    success: function(msg) {Di2015NewLine        alert(msg.d);   // var msg = {d: "li1234"} Di2015NewLine    },Di2015NewLine    error: function(res, status) {Di2015NewLine        if (status ==="error") {Di2015NewLine            // errorMessage can be an object with 3 string properties: ExceptionType, Message and StackTraceDi2015NewLine            var errorMessage = $.parseJSON(res.responseText);Di2015NewLine            alert(errorMessage.Message);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine});Di2015NewLine// version 4. We set "Content-Type: application/json" about our data, but we use no Di2015NewLine//            not 'dataType: "json"' parameter. Then we have "Accept: */*" in the requestDi2015NewLine//            instead of "Accept: application/json, text/javascript, */*" before.Di2015NewLine//            Everithing work OK like before.Di2015NewLine$.ajax({Di2015NewLine    type: "GET",Di2015NewLine    url: "/webmethods.asmx/AjaxGet",Di2015NewLine    data: {id: $.toJSON(id)},Di2015NewLine    contentType: "application/json; charset=utf-8",Di2015NewLine    success: function(msg) {Di2015NewLine        alert(msg.d);   // var msg = {d: "li1234"} Di2015NewLine    },Di2015NewLine    error: function(res, status) {Di2015NewLine        if (status ==="error") {Di2015NewLine            // errorMessage can be an object with 3 string properties: ExceptionType, Message and StackTraceDi2015NewLine            var errorMessage = $.parseJSON(res.responseText);Di2015NewLine            alert(errorMessage.Message);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine});Di2015NewLine// version 5. If we don't place "Content-Type: application/json" in our reqest weDi2015NewLine//            receive back XML (!!!) response with "HTTP/1.1 200 OK" header and Di2015NewLine//            "Content-Type: text/xml; charset=utf-8" which will be placed.Di2015NewLine//            How one can read inDi2015NewLine// http://weblogs.asp.net/scottgu/archive/2007/04/04/json-hijacking-and-how-asp-net-ajax-1-0-mitigates-these-attacks.aspx),Di2015NewLine//             ASP.NET AJAX will not make JSON serialized of response data forDi2015NewLine//             security reasons.Di2015NewLine$.ajax({Di2015NewLine    type: "GET",Di2015NewLine    url: "/webmethods.asmx/AjaxGet",Di2015NewLine    data: {id: $.toJSON(id)},Di2015NewLine    dataType: "json",Di2015NewLine    //contentType: "application/json; charset=utf-8",Di2015NewLine    success: function(msg) {Di2015NewLine        alert(msg.d);   // var msg = {d: "li1234"} Di2015NewLine    },Di2015NewLine    error: function (res, status, ex) {Di2015NewLine        // the code here will be works because of error in parsing server responseDi2015NewLine        if (res.status !== 200) {   // if not OKDi2015NewLine            // we receive exception in the next line, beDi2015NewLine            var errorMessage = $.parseJSON(res.responseText);Di2015NewLine            alert(errorMessage.Message);Di2015NewLine        } else {Di2015NewLine            alert("status=" + status + "\\nex=" + ex + "\\nres.status=" + res.status + "\\nres.statusText=" + res.statusText +Di2015NewLine                    "\\nres.responseText=" + res.responseText);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine});Di2015NewLine// version 6. Send more komplex data to/from the serviceDi2015NewLinevar myData = { id: "li1234", myInt: 100}Di2015NewLine$.ajax({Di2015NewLine    type: "GET",Di2015NewLine    url: "/webmethods.asmx/AjaxGetMore",Di2015NewLine    data: {input:$.toJSON(myData)},Di2015NewLine    dataType: "json",Di2015NewLine    contentType: "application/json; charset=utf-8",Di2015NewLine    success: function(msg) {Di2015NewLine        // var msg = {__type: "Testportal.OutputData", id: "li1234", message: "it's work!", myInt:101}Di2015NewLine        alert("message=" + msg.d.message + ", id=" + msg.d.id + ", myInt=" + msg.d.myInt); Di2015NewLine    },Di2015NewLine    error: function(res, status) {Di2015NewLine        if (status ==="error") {Di2015NewLine            // errorMessage can be an object with 3 string properties: ExceptionType, Message and StackTraceDi2015NewLine            var errorMessage = $.parseJSON(res.responseText);Di2015NewLine            alert(errorMessage.Message);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine});Di2015NewLine

2657547Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic void InvertSignature(ref byte[] original, Di2015NewLine    bool invertHorizontal, bool invertVertical)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < original.Length; i += 2)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if ((original[i] != 0) && (original[i + 1] != 0))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (invertHorizontal)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                original[i] = 232 - original[i] - 1;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            if (invertVertical)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                original[i + 1] = 64 - original[i + 1] - 1;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
2657547Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic void InvertSignature(ref byte[] original, Di2015NewLine    bool invertHorizontal, bool invertVertical)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    byte w = (byte)BitConverter.ToInt16(original, 0) - 1;Di2015NewLine    byte h = (byte)BitConverter.ToInt16(original, 2) - 1;Di2015NewLine    // TO DO: blow up if w or h are > 255Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 4; i < original.Length; i += 2)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if ((original[i] != 0) && (original[i + 1] != 0))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (invertHorizontal)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                original[i] = w - original[i];Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            if (invertVertical)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                original[i + 1] = h - original[i + 1];Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
2657547Di2015UniqueSeparatorMicrosoft.WindowsCE.Forms
2657547Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing Microsoft.WindowsCE.Forms;
2657547Di2015UniqueSeparatorSystemSettings.ScreenOrientation = ScreenOrientation.Angle180;Di2015NewLine
2657547Di2015UniqueSeparatorSystemSettings.ScreenOrientation = ScreenOrientation.Angle0;Di2015NewLine
2657547Di2015UniqueSeparatorctacke
2657547Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic void InvertSignature(ref byte[] original, Di2015NewLine    bool invertHorizontal, bool invertVertical)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    short w = BitConverter.ToInt16(original, 0);Di2015NewLine    short h = BitConverter.ToInt16(original, 2);Di2015NewLine    int i = 4;Di2015NewLine    while (i < original.Length)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (invertHorizontal)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (w < 256)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (original[i] != 0)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    original[i] = (byte)w - original[i] - 1;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                i++;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                short val = BitConverter.ToInt16(original, i);Di2015NewLine                if (val != 0)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    val = w - val - 1;Di2015NewLine                    byte[] valbytes = BitConverter.GetBytes(val);Di2015NewLine                    Buffer.BlockCopy(valbytes, 0, original, i, 2);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                i += 2;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            i += (w < 256) ? 1 : 2;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if (invertVertical)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (h < 256)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (original[i] != 0)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    original[i] = (byte)h - original[i] - 1;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                i++;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                short val = BitConverter.ToInt16(original, i);Di2015NewLine                if (val != 0)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    val = h - val - 1;Di2015NewLine                    byte[] valbytes = BitConverter.GetBytes(val);Di2015NewLine                    Buffer.BlockCopy(valbytes, 0, original, i, 2);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                i += 2;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            i += (h < 256) ? 1 : 2;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
2657614Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing (MemoryStream m = new MemoryStream(buffer))Di2015NewLineusing (StreamReader sr = new StreamReader(m))Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    while (!sr.EndOfStream)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string s = sr.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine    }    Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2662797Di2015UniqueSeparatorC
2662797Di2015UniqueSeparator2^(reach-distance)
2662797Di2015UniqueSeparatorC
2662797Di2015UniqueSeparatorenum Direction {Left, Right, Up, Down, None};Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDirection push(boolean board[][], int testX, int testY, int reach)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int xWeight = 0;Di2015NewLine    int yWeight = 0;Di2015NewLine    for (int xDist=-reach; xDist<=+reach; ++xDist)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        for (int yDist=-reach; yDist<=+reach; ++yDist)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int normDist = abs(xDist) + abs(yDist);Di2015NewLine            if (0<normDist && normDist<reach)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                int x = testX + xDist;Di2015NewLine                int y = testY + yDist;Di2015NewLine                if (0<=x && x<board.length && 0<=y && y<board[0].length)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                   if (board[x][y])Di2015NewLine                   {Di2015NewLine                       int force = getForceMagnitude(reach, normDist);Di2015NewLine                       xWeight += sign(xDist) * force;Di2015NewLine                       yWeight += sign(yDist) * force;Di2015NewLine                   }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    if (xWeight==0 && yWeight==0) return Direction.None;Di2015NewLine    if (abs(xWeight) > abs(yWeight))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return xWeight<0 ? Direction.Left : Direction.Right;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return yWeight<0 ? Direction.Up : Direction.Down;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineint getForceMagnitude(int reach, int distance)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return 1<<(reach-distance);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2668599Di2015UniqueSeparatorfunction AddData( Category, Type, Group, theData )Di2015NewLine    1. Search if the Category exist in array of categories, else add itDi2015NewLine    2. Search if the Type exist in array of Types, else add it Di2015NewLine    3. add the recDi2015NewLineend function Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinefunction DisplayData( )Di2015NewLine   //show headersDi2015NewLine   For each category in data.categoriesDi2015NewLine      For each Type in data.categoriesDi2015NewLine         AddColumn( Category, Type )Di2015NewLine      nextDi2015NewLine   nextDi2015NewLine   //get the groupsDi2015NewLine   for each group in (from g in data.table select g.group).distinctDi2015NewLine      for each category in data.categoriesDi2015NewLine         for each type in data.typesDi2015NewLine            cell = (from r in data.table where r.category = category and r.type = type and r.group = group)Di2015NewLine            if cell is nothing thenDi2015NewLine               addcell("null")Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine               addcell(cell)Di2015NewLine            end ifDi2015NewLine         nextDi2015NewLine      nextDi2015NewLine   nextDi2015NewLine

(!EnumThreadWindows(GetCurrentThreadId(), callback, IntPtr.Zero)) mTimer.Enabled = false;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    private bool checkWindow(IntPtr hWnd, IntPtr lp) {Di2015NewLine        // Checks if <hWnd> is a dialogDi2015NewLine        StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder(260);Di2015NewLine        GetClassName(hWnd, sb, sb.Capacity);Di2015NewLine        if (sb.ToString() != "#32770") return true;Di2015NewLine        // Got it, get the STATIC control that displays the textDi2015NewLine        IntPtr hCtl = GetDlgItem(hWnd, mCtlId);Di2015NewLine        SetWindowText(hCtl, mText);Di2015NewLine        // DoneDi2015NewLine        return true;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public void Dispose() {Di2015NewLine        mTimer.Enabled = false;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // P/Invoke declarationsDi2015NewLine    private const int WM_SETFONT = 0x30;Di2015NewLine    private const int WM_GETFONT = 0x31;Di2015NewLine    private delegate bool lp);Di2015NewLine    [DllImport("kernel32.dll")]Di2015NewLine    private static extern int GetCurrentThreadId();Di2015NewLine    [DllImport("user32.dll")]Di2015NewLine    private static extern int 2671675Di2015UniqueSeparatorvar numThreads = 20;Di2015NewLinevar toProcess = numThreads;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevar resetEvent = new ManualResetEvent(false);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinefor (var i = 0; i < numThreads; i++)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    ThreadPool.QueueUserWorkItem (Di2015NewLine        new WaitCallback(delegate(object state) {Di2015NewLine        Do_SomeWork(Parameter1, Parameter2, Parameter3);Di2015NewLine        if (Interlocked.Decrement(ref toProcess) == 0) resetEvent.Set();Di2015NewLine    }), null);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineresetEvent.WaitOne();Di2015NewLine
2671688Di2015UniqueSeparatorinterface IClass<out T> { }Di2015NewLineclass MyClass<T> : IClass<T> { }Di2015NewLine

2671725Di2015UniqueSeparatorwidth = 40
2671725Di2015UniqueSeparatornum = 2
2671725Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic PointF[][] MultiplyLine(PointF[] line, int width, int num)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (num == 1) return new PointF[][] { line };Di2015NewLine    if (num < 1) throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException();Di2015NewLine    if (line.Length < 2) return Enumerable.Range(0, num)Di2015NewLine                  .Select(x => line).ToArray();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Func<float, float, PointF> normVec = (x, y) => {Di2015NewLine        float len = (float)Math.Sqrt((double)(x * x + y * y));Di2015NewLine        return len == 0 ? new PointF(1f, 0f) : new PointF(x / len, y / len);Di2015NewLine    };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    PointF[][] newLines = Enumerable.Range(0, num)Di2015NewLine                  .Select(x => new PointF[line.Length]).ToArray();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    float numinv = 1f / (float)(num - 1), cor = 0f;Di2015NewLine    PointF vec1 = PointF.Empty, vec2 = PointF.Empty, vec3 = PointF.Empty;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int j = -1, i = -1;Di2015NewLine    foreach (PointF p in line)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        bool first = j == -1, last = j == line.Length - 2; j++;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (!last)Di2015NewLine            vec1 = normVec(line[j + 1].Y - p.Y, -line[j + 1].X + p.X);Di2015NewLine        if (!first)Di2015NewLine            vec2 = normVec(-line[j - 1].Y + p.Y, line[j - 1].X - p.X);Di2015NewLine        if (!first && !last)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            vec3 = normVec(vec1.X + vec2.X, vec1.Y + vec2.Y);Di2015NewLine            cor = (float)Math.Sin((Math.PI - Di2015NewLine                  Math.Acos(vec1.X * vec2.X + vec1.Y * vec2.Y)) / 2);Di2015NewLine            cor = cor == 0 ? 1 : cor;Di2015NewLine            vec3 = new PointF(vec3.X / cor, vec3.Y / cor);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        i = -1;Di2015NewLine        foreach (PointF[] newLine in newLines)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            i++; cor = (float)width * ((float)i * numinv - 0.5f);Di2015NewLine            vec1 = first ? vec1 : last ? vec2 : vec3;Di2015NewLine            newLine[j] = new PointF(vec1.X * cor + p.X, vec1.Y * cor + p.Y);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return newLines;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2674328Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate Stream SerializeMultipleObjects()Di2015NewLine{ Di2015NewLine    // Initialize a storage medium to hold the serialized objectDi2015NewLine    Stream stream = new MemoryStream();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Serialize an object into the storage medium referenced by 'stream' object.Di2015NewLine    BinaryFormatter formatter = new BinaryFormatter();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Serialize multiple objects into the streamDi2015NewLine    formatter.Serialize( stream, obOrders );Di2015NewLine    formatter.Serialize( stream, obProducts );Di2015NewLine    formatter.Serialize( stream, obCustomers );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Return a stream with multiple objectsDi2015NewLine    return stream; Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate void DeSerializeMultipleObject(Stream stream)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Construct a binary formatterDi2015NewLine    BinaryFormatter formatter = new BinaryFormatter();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Deserialize the stream into objectDi2015NewLine    Orders     obOrders    = (Orders)formatter.Deserialize( stream );Di2015NewLine    Products   obProducts  = (Products)formatter.Deserialize( stream );Di2015NewLine    Customers  obCustomers = (Customer)formatter.Deserialize( stream );Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2674751Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine[Flags] public enum PetTypeDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine   None = 0, Dog = 1, Cat = 2, Rodent = 4, Bird = 8, Reptile = 16, Other = 32Di2015NewLine};Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class ExampleDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine   public static void Main()Di2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine      object value; Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      // Call IsDefined with underlying integral value of member.Di2015NewLine      value = 1;Di2015NewLine      Console.WriteLine("{0}: {1}", value, Enum.IsDefined(typeof(PetType), value));Di2015NewLine      // Call IsDefined with invalid underlying integral value.Di2015NewLine      value = 64;Di2015NewLine      Console.WriteLine("{0}: {1}", value, Enum.IsDefined(typeof(PetType), value));Di2015NewLine      // Call IsDefined with string containing member name.Di2015NewLine      value = "Rodent";Di2015NewLine      Console.WriteLine("{0}: {1}", value, Enum.IsDefined(typeof(PetType), value));Di2015NewLine      // Call IsDefined with a variable of type PetType.Di2015NewLine      value = PetType.Dog;Di2015NewLine      Console.WriteLine("{0}: {1}", value, Enum.IsDefined(typeof(PetType), value));Di2015NewLine      value = PetType.Dog | PetType.Cat;Di2015NewLine      Console.WriteLine("{0}: {1}", value, Enum.IsDefined(typeof(PetType), value));Di2015NewLine      // Call IsDefined with uppercase member name.      Di2015NewLine      value = "None";Di2015NewLine      Console.WriteLine("{0}: {1}", value, Enum.IsDefined(typeof(PetType), value));Di2015NewLine      value = "NONE";Di2015NewLine      Console.WriteLine("{0}: {1}", value, Enum.IsDefined(typeof(PetType), value));Di2015NewLine      // Call IsDefined with combined valueDi2015NewLine      value = PetType.Dog | PetType.Bird;Di2015NewLine      Console.WriteLine("{0:D}: {1}", value, Enum.IsDefined(typeof(PetType), value));Di2015NewLine      value = value.ToString();Di2015NewLine      Console.WriteLine("{0:D}: {1}", value, Enum.IsDefined(typeof(PetType), value));Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine// The example displays the following output:Di2015NewLine//       1: TrueDi2015NewLine//       64: FalseDi2015NewLine//       Rodent: TrueDi2015NewLine//       Dog: TrueDi2015NewLine//       Dog, Cat: FalseDi2015NewLine//       None: TrueDi2015NewLine//       NONE: FalseDi2015NewLine//       9: FalseDi2015NewLine//       Dog, Bird: FalseDi2015NewLine

  TokenElevationTypeLimitedDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public enum TOKEN_INFORMATION_CLASSDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        TokenUser = 1,Di2015NewLine TokenSource,Di2015NewLine        TokenType,Di2015NewLine        TokenImpersonationLevel,Di2015NewLine        TokenStatistics,Di2015NewLine        TokenRestrictedSids,Di2015NewLine }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public enum SECURITY_IMPERSONATION_LEVELDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        SecurityAnonymous,Di2015NewLine        SecurityIdentification,Di2015NewLine        SecurityImpersonation,Di2015NewLine        SecurityDelegationDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static bool IsAdmin()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var identity = WindowsIdentity.GetCurrent();Di2015NewLine        return (null != identity && new WindowsPrincipal(identity).IsInRole(WindowsBuiltInRole.Administrator));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// The function checks whether the primary access token of the process belongsDi2015NewLine    /// to user account that is a member of the local Administrators group, even ifDi2015NewLine    /// it currently is not elevated.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns>Di2015NewLine    /// Returns true if the primary access token of the process belongs to userDi2015NewLine    /// account that is a member of the local Administrators group. Returns falseDi2015NewLine    /// if the token does not.Di2015NewLine    /// </returns>Di2015NewLine    public static bool CanBeAdmin()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        bool fInAdminGroup = false;Di2015NewLine        IntPtr hToken = IntPtr.Zero;Di2015NewLine        IntPtr hTokenToCheck = IntPtr.Zero;Di2015NewLine        IntPtr pElevationType = IntPtr.Zero;Di2015NewLine        IntPtr pLinkedToken = IntPtr.Zero;Di2015NewLine        int cbSize = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (IsAdmin())Di2015NewLine            return true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Check the token for this userDi2015NewLine            hToken = WindowsIdentity.GetCurrent().Token;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Determine whether system is running Windows Vista or later operatingDi2015NewLine            // systems (major version >= 6) because they support linked tokens, butDi2015NewLine            // previous versions (major version < 6) do not.Di2015NewLine            if (Environment.OSVersion.Version.Major >= 6)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Running Windows Vista or later (major version >= 6).Di2015NewLine                // Determine token type: limited, elevated, or default.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Allocate a buffer for the elevation type information.Di2015NewLine                cbSize = sizeof(TOKEN_ELEVATION_TYPE);Di2015NewLine                pElevationType = Marshal.AllocHGlobal(cbSize);Di2015NewLine                if (pElevationType == IntPtr.Zero)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    throw new Win32Exception(Marshal.GetLastWin32Error());Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Retrieve token elevation type information.Di2015NewLine                if (!GetTokenInformation(hToken,Di2015NewLine                    TOKEN_INFORMATION_CLASS.TokenElevationType, pElevationType, cbSize, out cbSize))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    throw new Win32Exception(Marshal.GetLastWin32Error());Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Marshal the TOKEN_ELEVATION_TYPE enum from native to .NET.Di2015NewLine                TOKEN_ELEVATION_TYPE elevType = (TOKEN_ELEVATION_TYPE)Marshal.ReadInt32(pElevationType);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // If limited, get the linked elevated token for further check.Di2015NewLine                if (elevType == TOKEN_ELEVATION_TYPE.TokenElevationTypeLimited)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    // Allocate a buffer for the linked token.Di2015NewLine                    cbSize = IntPtr.Size;Di2015NewLine                    pLinkedToken = Marshal.AllocHGlobal(cbSize);Di2015NewLine                    if (pLinkedToken == IntPtr.Zero)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        throw new Win32Exception(Marshal.GetLastWin32Error());Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    // Get the linked token.Di2015NewLine                    if (!GetTokenInformation(hToken,Di2015NewLine                        TOKEN_INFORMATION_CLASS.TokenLinkedToken, pLinkedToken,Di2015NewLine                        cbSize, out cbSize))Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        throw new Win32Exception(Marshal.GetLastWin32Error());Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    // Marshal the linked token value from native to .NET.Di2015NewLine                    hTokenToCheck = Marshal.ReadIntPtr(pLinkedToken);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // CheckTokenMembership requires an impersonation token. If we just gotDi2015NewLine            // a linked token, it already is an impersonation token.  If we did notDi2015NewLine            // get a linked token, duplicate the original into an impersonationDi2015NewLine            // token for CheckTokenMembership.Di2015NewLine            if (hTokenToCheck == IntPtr.Zero)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (!DuplicateToken(hToken, (int)SECURITY_IMPERSONATION_LEVEL.SecurityIdentification, ref hTokenToCheck))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    throw new Win32Exception(Marshal.GetLastWin32Error());Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Check if the token to be checked contains admin SID.Di2015NewLine            WindowsIdentity id = new WindowsIdentity(hTokenToCheck);Di2015NewLine            WindowsPrincipal principal = new WindowsPrincipal(id);Di2015NewLine            fInAdminGroup = principal.IsInRole(WindowsBuiltInRole.Administrator);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catchDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        finallyDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Centralized cleanup for all allocated resources.Di2015NewLine            if (pElevationType != IntPtr.Zero)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Marshal.FreeHGlobal(pElevationType);Di2015NewLine                pElevationType = IntPtr.Zero;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            if (pLinkedToken != IntPtr.Zero)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Marshal.FreeHGlobal(pLinkedToken);Di2015NewLine                pLinkedToken = IntPtr.Zero;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return fInAdminGroup;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
2677681Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing (SqlConnection conn = new SqlConnection(sqlConnString))Di2015NewLineusing (System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand cmd = new System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand())Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine   // code hereDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2679154Di2015UniqueSeparator[ProtoContract]Di2015NewLineclass MessageDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private readonly List<MessageParam> parameters = new List<MessageParam>();Di2015NewLine    [ProtoMember(1)]Di2015NewLine    public List<MessageParam> Parameters { get { return parameters; } }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine[ProtoContract]Di2015NewLine[ProtoInclude(3, typeof(MessageParam<int>))]Di2015NewLine[ProtoInclude(4, typeof(MessageParam<float>))]Di2015NewLine[ProtoInclude(5, typeof(MessageParam<DateTime>))]Di2015NewLine//...known types...Di2015NewLineabstract class MessageParam {Di2015NewLine    public abstract object UntypedValue { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public static MessageParam<T> Create<T>(T value) {Di2015NewLine        return new MessageParam<T> { Value = value };Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public static MessageParam CreateDynamic(object value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Type type = value.GetType();Di2015NewLine        switch (Type.GetTypeCode(value.GetType()))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // special casesDi2015NewLine            case TypeCode.Int32: return Create((int)value);Di2015NewLine            case TypeCode.Single: return Create((float)value);Di2015NewLine            case TypeCode.DateTime: return Create((DateTime)value);Di2015NewLine            // fallback in case we forget to add one, or it isn't a TypeCodeDi2015NewLine            default:Di2015NewLine                MessageParam param = (MessageParam)Activator.CreateInstance(Di2015NewLine                    typeof(MessageParam<>).MakeGenericType(type));Di2015NewLine                param.UntypedValue = value;Di2015NewLine                return param;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine[ProtoContract]Di2015NewLinesealed class MessageParam<T> : MessageParamDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    [ProtoMember(1)]Di2015NewLine    public T Value { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public override object UntypedValueDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return Value; }Di2015NewLine        set { Value = (T)value; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2684252Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static T GetValue<T>(object[] inputs)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (typeof(T).IsArray)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Type elementType = typeof(T).GetElementType();Di2015NewLine        Array array = Array.CreateInstance(elementType, inputs.Length);Di2015NewLine        inputs.CopyTo(array, 0);Di2015NewLine        T obj = (T)(object)array;Di2015NewLine        return obj;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return (T)inputs[0];Di2015NewLine        // will throw on 0-length array, check for length == 0 and return default(T)Di2015NewLine        // if do not want exceptionDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2684498Di2015UniqueSeparatorint getPrice(int n)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (n >= 1 && n <= 10) return 50 * n;Di2015NewLine    if (n >= 11 && n <= 20) return 40 * n;Di2015NewLine    if (n >= 21 && n <= 30) return 30 * n;Di2015NewLine    if (n >= 31 && n <= 50) return 20 * n;Di2015NewLine    throw new Exception("Impossible");Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineint minimizePrice(int n)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int[] minimumPrice = new int[n + 1];Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 1; i <= n; ++i)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        minimumPrice[i] = int.MaxValue;Di2015NewLine        for (int j = Math.Max(0, i - 50); j < i; ++j)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            minimumPrice[i] = Math.Min(minimumPrice[i],Di2015NewLine                minimumPrice[j] + getPrice(i - j));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return minimumPrice[n];Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2685002Di2015UniqueSeparatorT GetCached<T>(string cacheKey, Func<T> getDirect) {Di2015NewLine    object value = HttpContext.Current.Cache.Item(cacheKey);Di2015NewLine    if(value == null) {Di2015NewLine        value = getDirect();Di2015NewLine        HttpContext.Current.Cache.Insert(cacheKey, value);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return (T) value;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
2685153Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static float[] RadixSort(this float[] array)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // temporary array and the array of converted floats to intsDi2015NewLine    int[] t = new int[array.Length];Di2015NewLine    int[] a = new int[array.Length];Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < array.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine        a[i] = BitConverter.ToInt32(BitConverter.GetBytes(array[i]), 0);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // set the group length to 1, 2, 4, 8 or 16Di2015NewLine    // and see which one is quickerDi2015NewLine    int groupLength = 4;Di2015NewLine    int bitLength = 32;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // counting and prefix arraysDi2015NewLine    // (dimension is 2^r, the number of possible values of a r-bit number) Di2015NewLine    int[] count = new int[1 << groupLength];Di2015NewLine    int[] pref = new int[1 << groupLength];Di2015NewLine    int groups = bitLength / groupLength;Di2015NewLine    int mask = (1 << groupLength) - 1;Di2015NewLine    int negatives = 0, positives = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for (int c = 0, shift = 0; c < groups; c++, shift += groupLength)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // reset count array Di2015NewLine        for (int j = 0; j < count.Length; j++)Di2015NewLine            count[j] = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // counting elements of the c-th group Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < a.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            count[(a[i] >> shift) & mask]++;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // additionally count all negative Di2015NewLine            // values in first roundDi2015NewLine            if (c == 0 && a[i] < 0)Di2015NewLine                negatives++;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if (c == 0) positives = a.Length - negatives;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // calculating prefixesDi2015NewLine        pref[0] = 0;Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 1; i < count.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine            pref[i] = pref[i - 1] + count[i - 1];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // from a[] to t[] elements ordered by c-th group Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < a.Length; i++){Di2015NewLine            // Get the right index to sort the number inDi2015NewLine            int index = pref[(a[i] >> shift) & mask]++;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (c == groups - 1)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // We're in the last (most significant) group, if theDi2015NewLine                // number is negative, order them inversely in frontDi2015NewLine                // of the array, pushing positive ones back.Di2015NewLine                if (a[i] < 0)Di2015NewLine                    index = positives - (index - negatives) - 1;Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                    index += negatives;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            t[index] = a[i];Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // a[]=t[] and start again until the last group Di2015NewLine        t.CopyTo(a, 0);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Convert back the ints to the float arrayDi2015NewLine    float[] ret = new float[a.Length];Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < a.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine        ret[i] = BitConverter.ToSingle(BitConverter.GetBytes(a[i]), 0);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return ret;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
2685153Di2015UniqueSeparatorret[i] = BitConverter.ToSingle(BitConverter.GetBytes(a[i]), 0);Di2015NewLine
2685153Di2015UniqueSeparatorret[a.Length - i - 1] = BitConverter.ToSingle(BitConverter.GetBytes(a[i]), 0);Di2015NewLine
2685153Di2015UniqueSeparatorArray.Sort
2685153Di2015UniqueSeparatorNaN -> -Inf -> Min -> Negative Nums -> 0 -> Positive Nums -> Max -> +InfDi2015NewLine
2685153Di2015UniqueSeparatorfloat[] test = new float[10000000];Di2015NewLineRandom rnd = new Random();Di2015NewLinefor (int i = 0; i < test.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    byte[] buffer = new byte[4];Di2015NewLine    rnd.NextBytes(buffer);Di2015NewLine    float rndfloat = BitConverter.ToSingle(buffer, 0);Di2015NewLine    switch(i){Di2015NewLine        case 0: { test[i] = float.MaxValue; break; }Di2015NewLine        case 1: { test[i] = float.MinValue; break; }Di2015NewLine        case 2: { test[i] = float.NaN; break; }Di2015NewLine        case 3: { test[i] = float.NegativeInfinity; break; }Di2015NewLine        case 4: { test[i] = float.PositiveInfinity; break; }Di2015NewLine        case 5: { test[i] = 0f; break; }Di2015NewLine        default: { test[i] = test[i] = rndfloat; break; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
2685153Di2015UniqueSeparatorStopwatch sw = new Stopwatch();Di2015NewLinesw.Start();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinefloat[] sorted1 = test.RadixSort();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinesw.Stop();Di2015NewLineConsole.WriteLine(string.Format("RadixSort: {0}", sw.Elapsed));Di2015NewLinesw.Reset();Di2015NewLinesw.Start();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinefloat[] sorted2 = test.OrderBy(x => x).ToArray();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinesw.Stop();Di2015NewLineConsole.WriteLine(string.Format("Linq OrderBy: {0}", sw.Elapsed));Di2015NewLinesw.Reset();Di2015NewLinesw.Start();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineArray.Sort(test);Di2015NewLinefloat[] sorted3 = test;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinesw.Stop();Di2015NewLineConsole.WriteLine(string.Format("Array.Sort: {0}", sw.Elapsed));Di2015NewLine

2686025Di2015UniqueSeparatorint calculatePrice(int n, Dictionary<int, int> prices)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int[] best = new int[n + prices.Keys.Max()];Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 1; i < best.Length; ++i)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        best[i] = int.MaxValue;Di2015NewLine        foreach (int amount in prices.Keys.Where(x => x <= i))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            best[i] = Math.Min(best[i],Di2015NewLine                best[i - amount] + prices[amount]);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return best.Skip(n).Min();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevoid Run()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Dictionary<int, int> prices = new Dictionary<int, int> {Di2015NewLine        { 1, 299 },Di2015NewLine        { 5, 999 },Di2015NewLine        { 10, 1899 },Di2015NewLine        { 20, 3499 },Di2015NewLine        { 50, 7999 }Di2015NewLine    };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine(calculatePrice(136, prices));Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine(calculatePrice(4, prices));Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2686025Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static Dictionary<int, int> prices = new Dictionary<int, int> {Di2015NewLine            { 1, 299 },Di2015NewLine            { 5, 999 },Di2015NewLine            { 10, 1899 },Di2015NewLine            { 20, 3499 },Di2015NewLine            { 50, 7999 }Di2015NewLine    };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    class BundleDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public int Price;Di2015NewLine        public Dictionary<int, int> Licenses;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Bundle getBestBundle(int n, Dictionary<int, int> prices)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Bundle[] best = new Bundle[n + prices.Keys.Max()];Di2015NewLine        best[0] = new BundleDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Price = 0,Di2015NewLine            Licenses = new Dictionary<int, int>()Di2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int i = 1; i < best.Length; ++i)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            best[i] = null;Di2015NewLine            foreach (int amount in prices.Keys.Where(x => x <= i))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Bundle bundle = new BundleDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                     Price = best[i - amount].Price + prices[amount],Di2015NewLine                     Licenses = new Dictionary<int,int>(best[i - amount].Licenses)Di2015NewLine                };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                int count = 0;Di2015NewLine                bundle.Licenses.TryGetValue(amount, out count);Di2015NewLine                bundle.Licenses[amount] = count + 1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (best[i] == null || best[i].Price > bundle.Price)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    best[i] = bundle;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return best.Skip(n).OrderBy(x => x.Price).First();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    void printBreakdown(Bundle bundle)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        foreach (var kvp in bundle.Licenses) {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("{0,2} * {1,2} {2,-5} @ ${3,4} = ${4,6}",Di2015NewLine               kvp.Value,Di2015NewLine                kvp.Key,Di2015NewLine                kvp.Key == 1 ? "user" : "users",Di2015NewLine                prices[kvp.Key],Di2015NewLine                kvp.Value * prices[kvp.Key]);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int totalUsers = bundle.Licenses.Sum(kvp => kvp.Key * kvp.Value);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("-------------------------------");Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("{0,7} {1,-5}           ${2,6}",Di2015NewLine            totalUsers,Di2015NewLine            totalUsers == 1 ? "user" : "users",Di2015NewLine            bundle.Price);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    void Run()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("n = 136");Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine();Di2015NewLine        printBreakdown(getBestBundle(136, prices));Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine();Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine();Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("n = 4");Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine();Di2015NewLine        printBreakdown(getBestBundle(4, prices));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        new Program().Run();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2686605Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class JsonPSerializerDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private string Callback { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public JsonPSerializer(string callback)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.Callback = callback;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static string GetJson<T>(T obj)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        using (MemoryStream stream = new MemoryStream())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var serializer = new DataContractJsonSerializer(typeof(T));Di2015NewLine            serializer.WriteObject(stream, obj);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return Encoding.UTF8.GetString(stream.GetBuffer().TakeWhile( b => b != '\\0')).ToArray());Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public string Serialize<T>(List<T> list) where T : IModelDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        StringBuilder builder = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine        builder.AppendFormat("{0}([", Callback);Di2015NewLine        foreach (var obj in list)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            builder.Append(GetJson(obj));Di2015NewLine            builder.Append(",");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return builder.ToString().TrimEnd(',') + "])";Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public string Serialize<T>(T obj) where T : IModelDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string content = GetJson(obj);Di2015NewLine        return  Callback + "(" + content + ")";Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2686703Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static Expression<Func<T, bool>> AdHoc<T>Di2015NewLine            (string columnName, object compValue)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    //  Determine type of parameterDi2015NewLine    ParameterExpression parameter = Expression.Parameter(typeof(T), "x");Di2015NewLine    //  Target to compare toDi2015NewLine    Expression property = Expression.Property(parameter, columnName);Di2015NewLine    //  The value to matchDi2015NewLine    Expression constant = Expression.Constant(compValue, compValue.GetType());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Expression equality = Expression.Equal(property, constant);Di2015NewLine    Expression<Func<T, bool>> predicate =Di2015NewLine    Expression.Lambda<Func<T, bool>>(equality, parameter);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return predicate;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
2686703Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static Expression<Func<Document, bool>> SubQuery(string property, Di2015NewLine                                                         string targetValue)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var predicate = PredicateBuilder.True<User>();Di2015NewLine            predicate = predicate.And<User>(Extensions.AdHoc<User>(property, targetValue));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Expression<Func<Document, bool>> userSelector =Di2015NewLine                                    doc => doc.UsersDi2015NewLine                                        .AsQueryable()Di2015NewLine                                        .Any(predicate);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var docParm = Expression.Parameter(typeof(Document), "appDoc");Di2015NewLine            var body = Expression.Invoke(userSelector, docParm);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var docPredicate = PredicateBuilder.True<Document>();Di2015NewLine            docPredicate = docPredicate.And<Document>(Expression.Lambda<Func<Document, bool>>(body, docParm));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return docPredicate;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine

2689042Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate List<DateTime> IntervalInQuarters(DateTime myStartDate, DateTime myEndDate)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    DateTime quarterStart = new DateTime(2006, 06, 01);Di2015NewLine    DateTime nextQuarterStart = new DateTime(2006, 09, 01);Di2015NewLine    DateTime finalDate = new DateTime(2011, 01, 01);Di2015NewLine    List<DateTime> foundQuarters = new List<DateTime>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    while (quarterStart < finalDate)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // quarter intersects interval if:Di2015NewLine        // its start/end date is within our intervalDi2015NewLine        // our start/end date is within quarter intervalDi2015NewLine        DateTime quarterEnd = nextQuarterStart.AddDays(-1);Di2015NewLine        if (DateInInterval(myStartDate, quarterStart, quarterEnd) ||Di2015NewLine            DateInInterval(myEndDate, quarterStart, quarterEnd) ||Di2015NewLine            DateInInterval(quarterStart, myStartDate, myEndDate) ||Di2015NewLine            DateInInterval(quarterEnd, myStartDate, myEndDate))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            foundQuarters.Add(quarterStart);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        quarterStart = nextQuarterStart;Di2015NewLine        nextQuarterStart = nextQuarterStart.AddMonths(3);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return foundQuarters;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate bool DateInInterval(DateTime myDate, DateTime intStart, DateTime intEnd)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return ((intStart <= myDate) && (myDate <= intEnd));Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
